column2: Position: Computer Science and Engineering assistant professor Job Description: The Computer Science and Engineering Instructor/Professor is responsible for delivering high-quality instruction in the field of Computer Science and Engineering. This role involves teaching a range of courses, conducting research, and contributing to the academic community. Key Responsibilities: 01. Course Instruction: Develop and deliver lectures, labs, and tutorials in various Computer Science and Engineering subjects. Create course materials, including syllabi, assignments, and assessments. Provide guidance and mentorship to students to support their academic and professional development. 02. Research and Scholarship: Engage in research activities within the field of Computer Science and Engineering. Publish research findings in peer-reviewed journals and conferences. Pursue grant opportunities to fund research projects. 03. Curriculum Development: Contribute to the development and enhancement of the Computer Science and Engineering curriculum. Stay current with industry trends and incorporate relevant technologies and methodologies into courses. 04. Student Advising: Advise and mentor students in academic and career matters. Provide support for research projects, internships, and capstone projects. 05.Participation in Departmental Activities: Attend departmental meetings and contribute to decision-making processes. Collaborate with colleagues on departmental initiatives and committees. 06. Professional Development: Stay updated on advancements in Computer Science and Engineering through continued learning, attending conferences, and participating in professional organizations. 07. Community Engagement: Foster connections with industry professionals and organizations to enhance student opportunities. Participate in outreach activities to promote the Computer Science and Engineering program. Qualifications: A Ph.D. or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field. Teaching experience at the undergraduate or graduate level. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Research experience and a track record of publications (for higher-level academic positions). Skills: Proficiency in teaching various Computer Science and Engineering courses. Familiarity with instructional technologies and online learning platforms. Strong research and analytical skills. Ability to work collaboratively with colleagues and students.

column2: Job Title : LMS Administrator Role : Full Time  Location : GLA University, Greater Noida campus Experience  - 4 - 8  years About The Role of LMS Administrator is responsible for managing and overseeing the development and implementation of solutions. It involves coordinating with various teams including Sales, Technical Support, content developers, IT professionals, and Product Owners to ensure that projects are completed on time, within budget, and meet the desired quality standards. The role will recommend best practice solutions to any request or related issues within the LMS. Your  Responsibilities  Will Include   Develop project plans, define milestones, objectives, scope, and timelines, and allocate resources to complete the projects successfully.   Prepare and communicate project updates to stakeholders and escalate issues to the project sponsor or other relevant parties internal and external as and when required. ??Identify, evaluate, and manage potential project risks and develop contingency plans to minimize the impact of risks on the project.   Developing and maintaining standardized LMS operational processes and procedures, guidelines, and documentation.   Monitor and evaluate project outcomes to ensure that project goals and objectives are met, and identify areas for improvement.   Liaise with Sales and Technology to help identify new opportunities, win new business and increase sales.   Provide support for LMS administration, including catalogue management, security management, technical interface support, and use.  Ensuring proper governance model is followed, Report on product performance and Identify solutions to reduce technical support costs.   Reconfiguring existing learning/training to work within third-party online learning platform.  Address all platform-related queries on time and train customers to use the platform effectively.  Establish best practices for LMS site operation, administration & maintenance.  Provide technology and network operation team with customers' feedback to help improve the user's experience and identify new features and products.   Recognize and resolve the issues that may appear when it comes to course or campaign rollout during the onboarding phase of a client.  Experience    Minimum 4 years of experience working in LMS administration and/or learning program or project coordinator.   A bachelor's or master's degree in a relevant field such as instructional design, education technology, project management, or business administration.  Strong communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills are necessary to manage projects and coordinate with teams. The OM should be able to manage stakeholders and communicate effectively with project sponsors, instructional designers, developers, and subject matter experts.   The ability to analyze problems and develop effective solutions is important for successful project management.  A deep understanding of e-learning technologies, industry standards, and best practices is essential. Familiarity with Learning Management Systems (LMS), authoring tools, and e-learning content development is also important.  Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English with professional fluency.  Certification in project management such as PMP (Project Management Professional) or Agile Certified Practitioner (ACP) can be an added advantage.

column2: Full Time  Teacher Engagement Officer    CONTEXT:  Vinoba program of OpenLinks Foundation strives to deliver quality education in government schools by supporting teachers and Management. You will report directly to the COO.  Key Deliverables for the position are as follows:  Lead the Star Teacher Program. (Active teachers from all districts.)  Be in touch with Star Teachers to understand needs.  Communicate with the DEOs and Program Managers to co-relate star teachers with actual success of the school.  Identify and motivate other teachers  who are good  but not active on Vinoba. Design and oversee Teacher recognition Initiatives / Workshops / Conference. Coordinate with teachers for Feedback, Suggestions, and research etc.  Coordinate with teachers to form groups for small mission e.g. verifying question papers, making content etc.. Assist in research and data analysis work as and when required.  Engage in organisation development activities as and when required. Personal Attributes:  Humble, Creativity, Integrity, and social intelligence   Language: Basic proficiency in reading, writing in English. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted further.    Deadline for applications:  Rolling basis.

column2: Learning Exp Design & Dev Senior Analyst-Learning Experience Design and Development Skill required:Learning Experience Design and Development - Learning Content Development  Designation:Management Level - Senior Analyst  Job Location:Mumbai  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:5 to 8 years  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Learning and Collaboration vertical and help us in dealing with the end to end Learning and Development activities. In Learning Experience Design & Development team you will develop training assets that range from classroom, virtual, self-paced & digital as per the client requirement. This includes identifying training needs, conducting Learning Needs Analysis, writing high-level design, creating prototypes, developing content using prescribed tools, maintaining quality standards, conducting pilot runs, and delivering final output to the client within the set standards of quality, timeline and cost. The Learning Content Development team focuses on developing learning activities and supporting materials (for instructor-led training, web-based training, application simulations and performance simulation) according to the content design plan. The team is responsible for creating content for e-learning modules, developing training solutions using prescribed tools, quality, budget and milestone standards. The team is also responsible for participating in course test activities such as cycle testing, UAT, editorial and instructional design checks to properly document problems for issue resolution.  What are we looking for? Content Creation  Content Curation  Learning Content Analysis  Learning Content Development  Microsoft Office Suite  Ability to meet deadlines  Ability to work well in a team  Adaptable and flexible  Agility for quick learning  Written and verbal communication Roles and Responsibilities  In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of increasingly complex problems  Your day to day interactions are with peers within Accenture  You are likely to have some interaction with clients and/or Accenture management  You will be given minimal instruction on daily work/tasks and a moderate level of instruction on new assignments  Decisions that are made by you impact your own work and may impact the work of others  In this role you would be an individual contributor and/or oversee a small work effort and/or team  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

column1: Learning Exp Design & Dev Senior Analyst -Learning Experience Design
column2: Learning Exp Design & Dev Senior Analyst - Learning Experience Design and Development Skill required:Learning Experience Design and Development - Learning Content Development  Designation:Management Level - Senior Analyst  Job Location:Mumbai  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:5 to 8 years  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Learning and Collaboration vertical and help us in dealing with the end to end Learning and Development activities. In Learning Experience Design & Development team you will develop training assets that range from classroom, virtual, self-paced & digital as per the client requirement. This includes identifying training needs, conducting Learning Needs Analysis, writing high-level design, creating prototypes, developing content using prescribed tools, maintaining quality standards, conducting pilot runs, and delivering final output to the client within the set standards of quality, timeline and cost. The Learning Content Development team focuses on developing learning activities and supporting materials (for instructor-led training, web-based training, application simulations and performance simulation) according to the content design plan. The team is responsible for creating content for e-learning modules, developing training solutions using prescribed tools, quality, budget and milestone standards. The team is also responsible for participating in course test activities such as cycle testing, UAT, editorial and instructional design checks to properly document problems for issue resolution.  What are we looking for? Agility for quick learning  Ability to work well in a team  Written and verbal communication  Collaboration and interpersonal skills  Commitment to quality Roles and Responsibilities  In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of increasingly complex problems  Your day to day interactions are with peers within Accenture  You are likely to have some interaction with clients and/or Accenture management  You will be given minimal instruction on daily work/tasks and a moderate level of instruction on new assignments  Decisions that are made by you impact your own work and may impact the work of others  In this role you would be an individual contributor and/or oversee a small work effort and/or team  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

column2: Join a team recognized for leadership, innovation and diversity              We seek a highly skilled and creative Graphic Design Lead to join our Learning Development team     As the Graphic Design Lead, you will conceptualize, design, and deliver visually engaging and effective learning materials to support our organizations training and development initiatives     You will collaborate closely with subject matter experts, instructional designers, and other stakeholders to create compelling visual assets that enhance the learning experience for our employees                  Key Responsibilities:                Lead the design and development of visually appealing learning materials, including presentations, infographics, e-learning modules, 2D 3D informative interactive videos, Localization projects, and other digital assets.          Collaborate with subject matter experts and instructional designers to understand learning objectives and translate concepts into engaging visual representations.          Develop and maintain a consistent visual style and branding across all learning materials to ensure a cohesive and professional look and feel.          Utilize industry-standard design tools and software to create high-quality graphics, illustrations, and multimedia content.          Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and best practices in graphic design, e-learning, and learning technologies to improve the effectiveness and impact of learning materials continuously.          Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery within budget constraints and meeting quality standards.          Provide guidance and mentorship to junior graphic designers, fostering their professional growth and development.          Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including Learning Development, HR, Marketing, and IT, to align design efforts with organizational goals and priorities.          Conduct user testing and gather feedback to iterate on designs and optimize the learning experience for diverse audiences.          Uphold a commitment to accessibility and inclusivity by designing accessible materials for all learners, including those with disabilities.            Qualification:              Bachelors degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communications, or a related field.          Proven experience (8 10 years) as a graphic designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing creative and innovative design solutions.          Proficiency in industry-standard software, such as,              Experience designing for e-learning platforms and familiarity with learning management systems (LMS) is highly desirable.          Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively communicate complex ideas through visual storytelling.          Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage deadlines, and deliver high-quality work under pressure.          Knowledge of instructional design principles and adult learning theories is a plus.          Experience leading and mentoring a team of (8 10) graphic designers or other creative professionals is preferred.          A passion for learning and a commitment to staying updated on design trends, technologies, and best practices.              WE VALUE            Excellent writing and editing skills          Knowledge of eLearning course applications, including Lector, Articulate and more          Experience with Learning Management Systems          A comprehensive knowledge of (customer service)          Excellent team and communication skills          Being completely self-motivated          An ability to influence across a broader organization          An ability to exercise independent judgment

column2: Role & responsibilities     As an engineer at CADD Centre, your role involves conducting training sessions for both students and professionals in designated software skills. You provide guidance and support to learners to enhance their understanding and proficiency in the subject matter. Ensuring effective delivery of course content, you maintain high-quality standards in training, fostering an environment conducive to learning and skill development. Preferred candidate profile   Mechanical Field: Candidates must hold a Bachelor's degree (B.E/B.Tech) or a Master's (M.E/M.Tech) or a Diploma in Mechanical, Automobile, Aviation, or Production Engineering. Proficiency in a minimum of two software applications, selected from AutoCAD, PRO-E/Creo, SolidWorks, CATIA, NX/Unigraphics, and Ansys, is required. Civil Field: A Bachelor's degree (B.E/B.Tech/B.Arch) or a Master's (M.E/M.Tech) or a Diploma in Civil, Architectural, Structural, or Interior Designing is mandatory. Competence in at least two software programs such as AutoCAD, Revit/3ds Max, Sketchup, Primavera, BIM, Staad Pro., and E-Tabs is essential. Electrical Field: Candidates should possess a Bachelor's degree (B.E/B.Tech/B.Arch) or a Master's (M.E/M.Tech) or a Diploma in Electrical Engineering. Proficiency in a minimum of two software programs such as AutoCAD, AutoCAD Electrical, Revit MEP, PLC & SCADA, ETAP, or any two IT-related software mentioned below is required. Electronics Field: A Bachelor's degree (B.E/B.Tech/B.Arch) or a Master's (M.E/M.Tech) or a Diploma in Electronics / Electronics & Communication is required. Competence in at least two software programs such as AutoCAD, OrCAD, Microcontroller or at least any two IT-related software mentioned below is necessary. IT Field: Candidates must possess a Bachelor's degree (B.E/B.Tech/BCA/B.Sc) or a Master's degree (M.E/M.Tech/MCA/M.Sc) or a Diploma in Computer Science & Related Domains. Proficiency in a minimum of two programming languages or tools, including C, C++, Python, Java, Advanced Java, Full Stack (MEAN/MERN), Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, and ML, is mandatory. Business Field: A Bachelor's degree (BBA/B.Com) or a Master's degree (M.Com/MBA) is required. Proficiency in at least two software applications such as MS-Office, Tally, and Project Management, Digital Marketing, SAP is necessary. Perks and benefits   Flexible schedule Overtime pay Performance bonus Yearly Salary Revision

column2: Job Title: Training and Placement Officer-Perfecto Institute of Robotics and Automation. Location: Pune About Us: Perfecto Institute of Robotics and Automation is a leading institution specializing in automation and robotics education. We are committed to providing high-quality training and preparing our students for successful careers in the rapidly evolving fields of automation and robotics. Our programs combine theoretical knowledge with hands-on practical experience to ensure our graduates are well-equipped to meet industry demands. Position Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Training and Placement Officer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have 4 to 6 years of experience in a similar role, preferably within the education or training sector. The Training and Placement Officer will be responsible for developing and maintaining relationships with industry partners, coordinating internships and placements for students, and providing career guidance and support. Responsibilities: 1. Industry & University Engagement: - Develop and maintain relationships with industry partners, including automation and robotics companies, to understand their hiring needs and preferences. - Collaborate with industry professionals to organize guest lectures, workshops, and industry visits for students to enhance their understanding of real-world applications. - Assist in organizing and participating in promotional events, workshops, and seminars to raise awareness and attract students and industry partners to our institute. 2. Placement Coordination: - Facilitate internships and placements for students by identifying suitable opportunities and coordinating the application and selection process. - Provide guidance and support to students throughout the placement process, including resume writing, interview preparation, and professional networking. 3. Career Development: - Conduct career counseling sessions and workshops to help students identify their career goals and develop strategies to achieve them. - Keep abreast of industry trends and job market dynamics to provide timely advice and recommendations to students regarding career paths and skill development. 4. Data Management: - Maintain accurate records of student placements, including tracking placement outcomes and collecting feedback from employers and students. - Generate reports and analyze data to assess the effectiveness of placement strategies and identify areas for improvement. 5. Collaboration: - Work closely with faculty members to align curriculum with industry requirements and incorporate industry-relevant projects and case studies into the coursework. - Collaborate with the marketing and admissions team to promote the institute's placement success and attract prospective students. Qualifications: - MBA, HR. - 4 to 6 years of experience in training and placement, preferably in the field of automation and robotics or related industries. - Strong networking and relationship-building skills with the ability to engage effectively with industry professionals and employers. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to provide guidance and support to students from diverse backgrounds. - Proficiency in data management and analysis, with experience using relevant software tools and databases. - Knowledge of current trends and developments in the automation and robotics industry. - Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. Benefits: - Competitive salary commensurate with experience. - Opportunities for professional development and training. - Health insurance and other benefits as per company policy. - A dynamic and supportive work environment with opportunities for growth and advancement. If you are passionate about helping students launch successful careers in automation and robotics and possess the required skills and experience, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Please submit your resume and cover letter outlining your qualifications and suitability for the role.
column11: Placement Coordination, Student Counseling, Campus Hiring, Training Coordination, HR Operations, Batch Planning, Student Recruitment, Campus Interviews, Tpo, HR Administration, Campus Placement, Training And Placement, University Relations, Training Management

column2: Role & responsibilities   We are currently seeking a talented and passionate Software Testing Trainer to join our esteemed team. As a Software Testing Trainer, you will play a crucial role in imparting knowledge and skills in software testing to our students. You will be responsible for designing and delivering engaging training sessions, covering a wide range of testing methodologies, tools, and techniques. Responsibilities: Develop and update curriculum and training materials for software testing courses. Deliver high-quality training sessions in-person and/or virtually, ensuring effective learning outcomes for students. Provide hands-on guidance and support to students in understanding software testing concepts and practices. Assess student progress through assignments, quizzes, and practical exercises, and provide constructive feedback. Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in software testing to ensure the relevance of training content. Collaborate with other trainers and staff to continuously enhance training programs and learning experiences. Requirements: Preferred candidate profile  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience in software testing, with a solid understanding of testing methodologies, tools, and frameworks. Previous experience as a trainer, instructor, or educator, preferably in the field of software development or testing. Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex concepts clearly and understandably. Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to engage and motivate students from diverse backgrounds. Experience with test automation tools such as Selenium, Cucumber, or similar tools would be advantageous. Perks and benefits

column2: All the attributes that we are looking for in an ideal teammate.         Openness   - We welcome people from different backgrounds and schools of thought, Terraformers are open to different perspectives in approaching a solution and not just limit their thoughts or ideas to only a specific domain       Conscientiousness   - We believe in working together for the larger goal and with complete dedication and not just for personal benefits, however we do not expect terraformers to work to the point of burnout       Humility-    Being humble, grateful and respectful are the core traits of terraformers, we do not expect people to agree with every view of the management, feel free to have a different perspective but we always expect it to be put forward with respect       Risk Takers-    Terraformers are not afraid of the unknown and are open to new things, not that we encourage extreme risks without weighing the consequences but we are ones who take calculated risks       Autodidacts-    Terraformers teach themselves to learn, we do our own research to get solutions, we do not expect you to have a blank slate and figure everything out yourself, we are here to guide you but not handhold and micromanage you       Self Actualization-    Terraformers are on the path of self-actualization, we are not bothered by the noise and distractions around us, we only work towards achieving our full potential. We do not expect you to over-burden yourself and not have fun but we expect you to work to the best of your capabilities                     Roles, Responsibilities Expectations:               Teaching IELTS including spoken English to the students.     Making teaching plans for the IELTS Program.     Managing the class, preparing the lessons to be delivered to the students.     Preparing and setting tests, examination papers, and exercises. Students will be working on international live projects and complete them in the desired timeline with help of experienced team members. As a Full Stack Trainer, you will be responsible for training students on graphics, graphic design, visual communication, web design, and typography. You will be creating course materials, conducting assessments, conducting training sessions, and providing individualized feedback to students. column2: Position Title: Lead, Learn Punjab  Location: Mohali   Position Type: Regular Full-Time    You will own end-to-end responsibilities of designing and implementing Learning initiatives  that enable us to change the Education landscape of Punjab.  You will work with the foundation leader for developing and implementing the curriculum,  programme design and model, learning strategies, and impact assessment to gauge efficacy  of the programs and use the feedback to constantly improve processes and results.  You should have experience in running programmes on learning/ education within the  development sector, building professional partnerships with government and local bodies like  panchayats, DEOs etc. You should be well versed and up to date with models in education  and various pedagogies and should be able to contextualize them locally to augment  delivery. You would also be required to oversee governance, skill augmentation, regular  measurement, and evaluation, and managing team and multiple internal / external  stakeholders.   What you'll do:  ??Create the roadmap and strategy for the Foundation's Learn thematic area with clear short-, medium-, and long-term objectives based on a shared vision of desired  outcomes ??Define the learning framework including curriculum, policies, processes and systems  and ensuring all Learning initiatives/programs include direct engagement with the  community for effective execution and goal achievement/impact   ??Ensure that all learning programs are strategically designed including all elements of  need, measurability, scalability, and sustainability  ??Work closely with the Foundation's Fundraising team to collectively ensure that requisite funds are arranged in line with the initiative's plan and requirements. ??Ensure timely implementation of learning programs without compromising on quality  of output and resource utilization  ??Lead the Learning function which is sought to develop and manage knowledge based learning mechanisms and translate research insights into policy action  through on-the ground outreach and partnerships with key decision-makers   ??Consistently articulate RGF!s research undertakings and would also be responsible for the regular management of learning programs such as information collected from  different training events and constantly follow the latest developments in the field of  competitive training/education efforts   ??Facilitate course management activities including the production and dissemination  of course resources by ideating with Leads to extract lessons, distil them and  disseminate to local communities  ??Leverage marketing efforts of new and current programs and manage and oversee  RGF!s outreach efforts and showcase organization!s work to pertinent stakeholders / community  ??Work with Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) and conduct independent research to  develop training plans that will address identified skills gaps, including the design of  assessment and evaluation tools  ??Identify and assess learning needs of staff and other partners to identify appropriate  learning solutions that will address skills gaps   Who we're looking for:  ??Bachelor!s / Master!s degree in Social Management/Education with 15 years of experience  ??Should have a track record of setting up, strengthening, and scaling up education  systems at a state/district level  ??Understands the education system of Punjab, India, and the world to provide  contextualised and innovative programs  ??Skilled in building trusted relationships, clarity of direction, roles, and responsibilities.  Effective in removing barriers to success and in maintaining direction and  momentum.  ??Excellent written and verbal communication. Communicating in a clear and efficient  way to create buy-in across diverse communities, to keep projects moving, and to  manage stakeholder expectations.  ??Flexible and creative to be able to switch between operational and strategic tasks  with ease.  ??Ability to stretch limits to meet deadlines and time-bound goals for self and team  members ??Outstanding leadership capabilities, ability to communicate a compelling vision and  drive results while developing a strong team ??Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with minimal supervision and comfortable  with the ambiguity  Why RoundGlass: RoundGlass was built on the vision that wellbeing should be at the very center of our life  journey. We are not only reimagining how the world experiences wellbeing, but how  companies (like our own) support the wellbeing of their people.  We!re a group of talented, socially conscious, gritty, innovators using technology and human energy to create a vibrant wellness ecosystem. Together, we!ve built an amazing community and we are always looking for people who share our passion.   About RoundGlass Foundation:   RoundGlass Foundation is pursuing a bold vision to bring abundance and prosperity back to  the state of Punjab in India through philanthropic initiatives supporting under-served rural  and urban communities. Since our founding in 2018, we have been engaged in a wide range  of far-reaching projects, directly involving village communities in building opportunity and  sustainable development in the region. Our Model Village initiatives have impacted the lives  of almost 19,00,000 people in over 1800 villages across the state through our programmes  clubbed under the thematic areas: Environment & Sustainability, Youth and Women  Empowerment. On the Learn Punjab front, RG Foundation has already activated 160 Learn Labs which work  with almost 4000 children across the villages of Punjab. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not  discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation,  age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. RoundGlass will provide reasonable  accommodation to individuals with disabilities who need assistance applying for a job.  Please contact Talentacquisition.in@round.glass for more information.  We rely on legitimate interest as a legal basis for processing personal information under the  GDPR for purposes of recruitment and applications for employment

column2: What you'll do: Perform routine maintenance and calibration of diode laser equipment to ensure optimal performance. Troubleshoot and diagnose technical issues with diode laser systems, both hardware and software. Conduct repairs and replacements of components as necessary, adhering to manufacturer guidelines and safety protocols. Keep detailed records of maintenance activities, repairs, and equipment inventory. Collaborate with medical staff to ensure that diode laser systems meet the requirements for specific cosmetic procedures. Stay updated on advancements in diode laser technology and recommend upgrades or new equipment as needed. Provide training and technical support to clinic staff on the proper use and maintenance of diode laser equipment WHAT MAKES YOU A GREAT FIT  :   Bachelor's degree in Aesthetic Science, Cosmetology, Trichology, or a related field. Proven experience as a trainer or educator in the field of aesthetics, hair replacement, or hair restoration. Strong knowledge of aesthetic procedures, hair replacement techniques, and hair transplant methodologies. Excellent presentation and communication skills, with the ability to engage and motivate learners. Demonstrated the ability to develop training materials and deliver effective training programs. Detail-oriented with a passion for continuous learning and professional development. Willingness to travel to outstation clinics as required. EXPERIENCE 2-5 years of experience in training for aesthetics, hair transplants, and hair replacement. REMUNERATION Upto 65,000 P.M Provident Fund (optional) Gratuity payable as per law TDS is deductible as per law JOB TYPE Full Time/Permanent OFFICE TIMINGS Office hours: 10:00 to 19:00 . In case of any query , please call Ms. Mamta Upreti (9599219220) or email at jobs@berkowits.in

column2: Job Title:  Computer Science Lecturer Location:  Nalanda Degree College, Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh, India Job Type:  Full-Time/Part-Time About Our College: Renowned institution committed to excellence in higher education. Emphasis on innovative teaching and research in the field of computer science. Job Summary:  Nalanda Degree College is seeking a passionate and qualified Lecturer (Computer Science) to join its growing department. The selected candidate will be responsible for delivering engaging lectures, developing course curricula, and fostering a love for computer science in students. Job Description: Deliver comprehensive and engaging computer science curriculum. Foster a deep understanding of computer science principles and their practical applications. Prepare students for successful careers in technology and related fields. Responsibilities:  The key responsibilities of the Lecturer (Computer Science) will include the following: Curriculum Delivery: Design and execute interactive computer science lectures and lab sessions on various topics, including: Programming Languages (C, C++, Java, Python) Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) Cyber Security Computer Graphics Web Development (PHP & MySQL) Internet of Things (IoT) R Programming Software Testing Big Data Technologies Data Mining Cloud Computing Digital Forensics Database Management Systems (DBMS) Lesson Planning: Develop detailed lesson plans aligned with university guidelines and industry standards. Stay updated on the latest advancements in computer science and integrate them into the curriculum. Student Assessment: Evaluate student progress through assignments, projects, and exams; maintain accurate academic records. Classroom Management: Maintain discipline and foster a collaborative and inclusive learning environment. Parental Engagement: Engage with parents/guardians as needed to discuss student progress and address concerns. Professional Development: Pursue continuous professional development and engage in collaborative research with colleagues. Contribute to the overall development of the computer science department. Qualifications:  To be considered for the position of Lecturer (Computer Science), the candidate must have the following qualifications: Founder Level: 1-3 years of experience in teaching computer science, Masters degree in Computer Science. Master Level: 4-8 years of experience, Masters degree in Computer Science. Developer Level: 9+ years of experience, Masters degree in Computer Science or related field. Additional Qualifications: Masters degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (M.Tech, MCA, M.Sc. Computer Science). Minimum of 3 to 5 years of teaching experience in computer science at the undergraduate level (preferred). Maximum of 10 to 15 years of relevant teaching or industry experience (desirable). Strong foundation in programming languages (C, C++, Java, Python). Working knowledge of Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Cyber Security, and other mentioned skills (a plus). Excellent communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills. Ability to create a positive and engaging learning environment. Passion for teaching and a commitment to student success. Screening Process: Written Test:  Subject-specific exam in computer science. Proficiency Test:  Assessment of MS Office and programming skills. Reading Test:  Conducted via Microsoft Teams. Teaching Demonstration:  Mock classroom session. Benefits: Competitive compensation and benefits. Opportunities for professional growth and development. Supportive and collaborative work environment.
column11: Programming Languages, Presentation Skills, Cyber Security, Cloud Computing, Database Management Systems, Software Testing, Adaptability, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, Big Data Technologies, Web Development, Communication, Interpersonal Skills

column2: Senior Wing Leader (Grade IX to XII): Key Responsibility Areas Responsibilities / Activities: ACADEMICS: Plan the years academic work in advance in consultation with Wing Teachers, Principal, and Director and review the work done during the month and assess the progress of the pupils. (Planning should be done monthly, quarterly, half-yearly and yearly). To lead the development of appropriate syllabuses, resources, scheme of work, marking policies, assessment and teaching and learning strategies in the wing. Plan for the effectiveness of Curriculum Delivery by using the Academic Calendar. Replenishment of Teaching Aids as per requirement.  Plan and specify a regular timetable for the scrutiny of pupils written work and home assignments and ensure that the assessment and corrections are carried out timely and effectively. Substitute Teacher allocation to be done after determining the absence of any Teacher. Implement, inculcate and promote academic brilliance culture in the school. Is expected to share the responsibility with Teachers about the emotional and physical well-being of each student in the respective grade levels. Ensure implementation of Administrative Systems, Processes and Policies and conduct Audits at regular intervals by observing the teachers of your wing. -Monitoring classroom teaching, class observations, ensuring good quality of notebook correction work, checking question paper for unit tests, halfyearly, Annual, pre-boards and revision tests, regular checking of notebooks of the students- in all subjects Needs to receive the follow-up reports and updates every week from Special Educator if any student is under counselling; compile and maintain records of the same. To actively monitor student`s progress for his/her wing. Ensuring that teachers reach the classes on time. EXAMINATION AND ASSESSMENT:  IX to XII:  Plan the examination process, date sheets of unit tests, mid-term, annual and pre-board examinations, ensure examinations are conducted smoothly, maintain the result, and ensure timely generation of Report Cards.  Conduct of school examination in accordance with the instructions issued by the Government/Board from time to time; and he/she shall discharge these duties in consultation with his/her colleagues. CBSE Registrations grade-IX & XI  Dealing with CBSE for filling up board data for classes X & XII   Board Results of Class X & XII- results of all other classes, results of Olympiads and overall performance of students. Planning and organising the Unit Tests, midterm examination, pre-board, Annual examination and declaration of results in time. REMEDIALS:  Arrange for specific remedial teaching of the students whose performance is below average in different subjects and also of other students who need remedial teaching.   EXHAUSTIVE DOCUMENTATION  of all records related to academic rigour in these Grades. Record keeping of events and submission of Feedback of the same to the Principal.   EVENTS AND ASSEMBLIES:  Planning and executing, arranging resources and filling requisitions for academic purposes.   Taking reports of morning games for his/her wing and try to enhance Teams performance by encouraging the Team students/athletes.   Plan/Organise/Coordinate all the events such as Parent Orientation, PTA, PTM, Field Trips, Sports Day, Annual Function, Special Events, Culminating activities and all Competitions as per the guidelines.   Coordinators should send Field Trips proposals seeking approvals during the year in appropriate & suitable time from the Principal and Management.   Delegate duties to the Teaching and Non-Teaching Staff (Teachers) for all the events.   Extra- Curricular Activities are to be conducted as planned.   Circulars to be sent to Parents in Advance for the events.   Records of extra-curricular activities along with the list of students class wise to be maintained by the Wing Leader and activity coordinator.   DISCIPLINE:  Student discipline to be maintained inside the classroom, in the corridors an activity area within the School premises. Indiscipline to be discussed with Parents and other concerned persons and to be reported to the Principal for further action.   CIRCULARS AND NOTICES:  Timely distribution of any circular and notice. To ensure a copy of the same is filed with the School Office.    CHECKING OF TEACHERS DIARY/LESSON PLAN AND ATTENDANCE REGISTERS:  These are official documents must be checked and kept up to date at all times.   DRESS CODE:  To ensure that the concerned staff of your Wing follows an appropriate formal dress code. Ensure that the I-Cards are worn by the teachers / students.   OUTSIDE & INSIDE CLASSROOM DISPLAY BOARDS:  The boards in the corridors and classrooms to be well maintained. Should be changed regularly according to the appropriate themes.   Charts displayed on the soft boards during Events and otherwise should be without any errors in language or content mentioned.   Preservation of Charts should be done appropriately keeping in mind the space constraints. PARENT INTERACTION  with regards to academics and Student discipline, activities, and reports for Special needs children to be discussed with Parents from time to time  To liaise with the Admin Team and ensure that any problems on the floor related to the classrooms, staffrooms, washrooms, electricity, furniture, cleanliness, soft boards, lockers, equipments in Labs etc. are addressed and resolved on time and the same is maintained in the Maintenance Register. Audit of Labs, Library & stores to be conducted regularly.   Teaching Faculty Development: To work in coordination with the Principal-Staff Development to ensure that the staff development needs are identified, and appropriate training is identified.   Refresher Training to be given as and when required on specific areas like maintenance of Records including Attendance registers, Logbooks, School Dairy, etc.   To mentor and train Teachers to take on challenges and additional responsibilities conducive to their professional growth.   To participate in Training Programmes, Conference, Courses and other aspects of Professional growth recommended by the School management.   Encourage their participation in courses designed for in service education.    Promote the initiative of the teachers for self-improvement and encourage them to undertake experiments which are educationally sound.   Plan, supervise, guide and provide support to the teaching staff of the school   Plan and organise workshops for various teaching strategies, learning styles etc. to scaffold the teaching faculty in effective transactions in the classrooms.   To co-ordinate for board practicals with external examiners. Recruitment/ Deployment of Staff   To make appropriate arrangements for classes when staff are absent, ensuring appropriate cover within the department.   To participate in the interview process for teaching posts and to ensure effective induction of new staff in line with School Procedures.   To promote teamwork and to motivate staff to ensure effective working relations.   To be responsible for day-to-day management of staff within the designated department and act as a professional role model.   Teaching Quality Standards:   Plan, prepare and execute Annual Syllabus, Monthly Break-up of the Syllabus, Fortnightly Syllabus and Daily Progression. To co-ordinate and support the departments of Health & wellness, L&D and IT specially for ERP and artwork at the time of special occasions; functions, events etc belonging to these department.   To promote high standards of teaching learning and assessment.   To actively participate in School monitoring and evaluation procedures for Curriculum progression.   Check and approve Lesson plans with the help of subject coordinators and curriculum made by Teachers of the Secondary level.   Maintain Academic Records of Students.   Supervise Report Card Generation.   Observe lessons in each subject area daily for different classes and sections.   Provide timely curriculum related feedback to the Teachers.   Ensure uniformity in the implementation of the Lesson Plans.   To conduct monthly/fortnightly meetings as per requirement and should be circulated to all the concerned employees to be shared with the principal. Maintain minutes of meetings in writing and should be signed by everyone, whosoever attended the meeting.   Discuss the support programmes with the Team members during curriculum Workshops.   Maintain a detailed track record of academic coverage of support programme and effectiveness of the same to be monitored closely. Monitor Record Keeping of the support programmes.   Ensure that the students attend all the Remedial Sessions.   Organise/ supervise various co-curricular activities through the house system or clubs or other ways as he/she may think appropriate.   Maintain School Decorum and Professional Protocol   To play a full part in the life of the School community, to support its distinctive mission and ethos and to encourage and ensure staff and students to follow this.    Adhere and comply with all School Policies, Systems, Procedures and Rules.   School timings for the wing Leader will be as school office timings or specified timings daily or as per requirement on special days.   Perform Additional Duties as and when allocated for special occasions   Keep the Principal abreast with daily debrief sessions.   Maintain professional hierarchy and follow (and promote) professional decorum and protocol.   Seek formal approvals of proposals and plans from the Principal/Management as per requirements.   The ideal candidate will have:   a) 12-20 years of relevant experience; must have 8-10 years of Administrative experience b) Leadership skills c) Cultural awareness, professionalism, integrity, and flexibility d) Analytical Skills e) Can formulate and implement policies and processes f) Strong communication and negotiation skills g) Ability to manage multiple and varied tasks with enthusiasm and prioritize workload with attention to detail h) High standards of personal ethics and integrity Should be detail-oriented.

The successful candidate will be responsible for contributing to the departments academic and research missions through teaching, research, and service.      Responsibilities:        Teaching:       Design and deliver undergraduate and/or graduate courses in computer science.      Create engaging and effective instructional materials.      Foster an inclusive and interactive learning environment.      Provide constructive feedback and support to students.        Research:       Conduct high-quality research in computer science or related fields.      Publish research findings in reputable peer-reviewed journals and conferences.      Seek external funding through grants and research projects.      Collaborate with colleagues, both within and outside the department.        Advising and Mentoring:       Advise and mentor undergraduate and graduate students.      Supervise student research projects, theses, and dissertations.      Provide academic and career guidance to students.        Service:       Participate in departmental meetings, committees, and other administrative activities.      Contribute to the development and assessment of academic programs.      Engage in outreach activities to promote the department and university.        Professional Development:       Stay current with advancements in the field of computer science.      Attend conferences, workshops, and seminars.      Engage in professional organizations and networks.      Qualifications:      Masters in Computer Science or a closely related field.      Demonstrated excellence in teaching at the undergraduate and/or graduate levels.      A strong record of research productivity with publications in reputable journals and conferences.      Ability to secure external funding for research projects is desirable.      Effective communication and interpersonal skills.      Commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion in education and research

column2: GP Strategies Corporation is one of the worlds leading talent transformation providers. By delivering award-winning learning and development solutions, we help organizations transform through their people and achieve meaningful change. GP Strategies has delivered our innovative consulting, learning service, and talent technology solutions to over 6,000 organizations globally. From our global experience working across thousands of projects and initiatives over the past 55 years, we've learned that relationships, business work, innovation, strategy, and transformation are all about people. And, to put it simply, GP Strategies is about our people-an extensive global network of learning experts. Additional information can be found at www.gpstrategies.com Position :  Automobile Technical Evaluator-SSQS Bronze OR SSQS Silver Location(s) :   PAN INDIA (1.Kolkata, WB | 2.Panchkula, HR/Chandigarh, CH | 3.Lucknow, UP | 4.Chennai, TN | 5.Bangalore, KA | 6.Hyderabad, TS | 7.Pune, MH | 8.Ahmedabad, GJ) Duration:  Full-time Must Have Qualification(s):   Education should be Diploma/BE in Mechanical/Automobiles SSQS Bronze/Silver Certified Roles and Responsibilities Check Attendance for participants / Attendance update thru RTM app or Web portal Check the ID for all participants before entering Evaluation center. Preparation of system/Computers/Pads for theory exam. Prepare all the necessary printouts for practical exam. SSQS evaluations would be taken on STEP (Service Training Evaluation Portal) SSQS evaluation will be in to two stages as SSQS Bronze and SSQS Silver. Web based link for theory examination thru iPad available at RTCs Phase 1 Candidates appear for theory exam thru paper-based method, checking of same needs time and scores entered manually in score sheet by evaluators. Conduct the theory exam for all the participants. Attendance to be marked in STEP before initiating theory test Based out of Theory exam eligible candidates are selected for practical exam. Web based link for theory examination thru iPad available at RTCs organized by evaluators Phase 2 Practical evaluation done by Evaluators thru paper-based method, evaluating same needs time and scores entered manually in score sheet by evaluators. Practical evaluation will be conducted thru Service Training Evaluation Portal (STEP).  Preparation of Vehicle for practical examination. Preparation of tools and Equipment for practical. For each practical apply the necessary settings in the vehicle kept for examination. For each participant evaluator must Prepare the tools and vehicle for practical examination. If it's silver certification then the evaluator must prepare everything to conduct two practical exams. After completing practical exam evaluator must prepare result. Share the report/results to client on the same day and update all the report to the online portal. After sharing report evaluator must download the results for each candidate and take print out then attach the sheets with individual candidate check sheet. Maintain the report hard copy in RTC (Regional Training Centre). General Tasks Course Instruction-facilitates learning in a classroom and workshop environment, transfer service-related skills Facility Maintenance, maintains classrooms, student areas to a high standard of appearance and function Assists with preparing and administering various training programs. Schedules the appropriate classroom and prepares the physical setup. Possess a high level of organization and administrative skills to display the ability to accomplish many tasks. Must be up to date on all market and  product technical knowledge from basic to advance level Must be responsible for prep days Traveling to given locations to complete the monthly calendar plan Thanks & Regards, Nithin P Talent Acquisition Specialist Email: pnithin@gpstrategies.com GP Strategies India Private Ltd  https://www.gpstrategies.com/   With more than 4000 employees in over 30 countries, diversity at GP Strategies is second nature! Beyond our locations, our culture focuses an performance and revolves around respect, fairness, and working collaboratively to achieve our goals. We support our People, no matter who they are or where they are from, because we all have valuable and unique perspectives and approaches. That's how great ideas are born which enable to work smarter. GP Strategies is committed and proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, gender, age, religion, disability, sexual orientation, or veteran status

column2: The Master Teacher is the backbone of Avanti s classroom responsible for the end-to-end operations for one Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya school including teaching, inspiring, training and motivating students towards achieving their learning goals. We are looking of Teachers having 4-6 years of experience in Teaching(JEE Advance/NEET level)        Key responsibilities include, but are not limited to:        Following are the major responsibilities that could change as per demand of the dynamic work requirements.        The role of a Master Teacher involves the following tasks, functions and responsibilities:        Prepare for classroom sessions with Presentation Slides in advance and teach students for ~30 hours a week using Avanti s unique pedagogy in which students discuss conceptual questions with peers and work collaboratively on problem sets/assignments      Explains concepts with clarity in a creative interesting way using real life examples.      Actively monitor students progress, their classwork and homework to ensure that they are on track to achieving their learning goals      2. Training Orient new hires about Avanti Pedagogy and introduce them to teaching process      Conduct training sessions to new hires and help them improve in teaching skills and maintain the training notes      3. Mentoring, Career Guidance and Academic Support Build strong relationships with students through one-on-one interaction sessions, helping students overcome their problems both academic and personal in the process      Regularly work with students to break down their academic workload into small achievable goals; Track their progress on these goals      Debrief with students regularly on their test scores and classroom performance (both CBSE board and Avanti); suggesting ideas for improvement      Enable students to chalk out their future career paths by providing them with information about different options available to them based on their strengths and interests      4. Parent Engagement Discuss student performance with their parents in person or over phone at least once a month.      Conduct Parent Teacher Meetings(PTMs) in schools at least once every 3 months and share aggregate and individual reports on student performance with parents      5. Data Analysis Consistently collect and upload feedback about classroom and test performance on Avanti s online learning management system      Generate insights on reasons for poor student performance; devise solutions to address those problems      6. Additional Initiatives Create a healthy learning culture by working on initiatives like (but not limited to) arranging expert guest sessions, organizing field trips/excursions, planning scientific debates in the classroom, etc.      Full time degree in M.Sc./ B.E./B.Tech/M.Tech      Proficiency in Class XI XII Physics/Chemistry/Maths/Biology (one subject). Experience required is 4-6 years teaching JEE/NEET level.

column2: Responsible for creating and implementing training programs and overseeing the development of careers. Sets performance metrics, evaluates productivity, and helps workers create long-term career plans within an organization.     Along with training development the candidate should also be well versed in communications management documentation, service delivery and quality control of the services being delivered.     The job may not comprise of Training and development alone and the candidate is expected to adapt, learn and develop to accept any new job openings or requirements coming up in the organization and thereby be a dynamic leader, multi-skilled and multi-tasking as and when required.     To start with the candidate should showcase and inherit a matured, calm and kind attitude as a manager. The candidate is expected to support, train and develop the new hires and freshers joining the organization primarily.     The candidate must have a very fluent English both verbal and written.   Experience    The candidate must have a consistent and relevant work experience either HR, Team Leading or Training and development. Minimum of 3 to 5 years of experience.    Primary responsibilities      Develop, implement, and monitor training programs within an organization.     Supervise technical training for staff.     Conduct orientation sessions.     Create brochures and training materials.     Develop multimedia visual aids and presentations.     Create testing and evaluation processes.     Prepare and implement training budget.     Evaluate needs of company and plan training programs accordingly.     Conduct performance evaluations.     Provide companies with classroom training, demonstrations, on-the-job training, meetings, conferences, and workshops.     Manage staff of classroom facilitators.     Provide performance feedback.     Conduct continuing education training.     Provide leadership development education.     Build solid cross-functional relationships.     Provide logistical support, course development, delivery, evaluation, process measurements, and cost management.     Plan the implementation and facilitation of activities and events, budget spending, material production and distribution, and other resources to ensure that operations are managed within authorized budgets.     Assist with the development of strategic plans.     Qualification    Any Bachelors degree/ Masters degree or equivalent.

  Manage a team of master trainers in multiple languages and equip them to execute high-quality training for partners at a scale         Identify and document the best practices & challenges emerging column2: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced BPO trainer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, delivering, and evaluating training programs for our BPO operations. As a BPO Trainer , you will play a crucial role in ensuring that our employees are equipped with the necessary skills and knowledge to deliver exceptional customer service and achieve operational excellence. Roles   &   Responsibilities ??The key responsibility in this role is on boarding the new people to the customer service, inside  sales development role. This includes intensive training as per various processes and the topics  covered would be around product, process, culture, soft skills and so on. ??Developing call centers' education materials, such as digital presentations, how-to manuals, and instructional videos. ??Collate the training results and documentation of the same to present to the senior management weekly/monthly ??Ongoing call listening sessions with the teams and providing feedback to help them get from 70% or lesser to 90%+ ??Training experienced employees on new or updated procedures to improve their performance. ??Observing the daily operations of employees and identifying any areas of improvement. ??Liaising with team leaders and managers to conduct on-the-job coaching. ??Measuring the effectiveness of training sessions and preparing individual or team progress reports. ??Ensuring employees keep up their productivity and maintain high levels of customer satisfaction. Requirements: ??A bachelor's degree in human resources, or a related field. ??Additional certification in business leadership, eLearning software, or adult education and training is preferred. ??At least 2 year's experience working as a call center trainer ??Familiarity with learning management systems, such as Google Classroom, Blackboard, and Schoology. ??Excellent knowledge of sales techniques and customer service best practices. ??Strong teaching abilities and mentoring skills. ??Good communication, interpersonal, and conflict resolution skills. ??Ability to provide leadership to personnel in a fast-paced and stressful work environment. Location- Gurgaon Mode- Work from office ,  6 days working

column2: Our summer internship program for bachelors and masters degree candidates provides broad exposure to the consulting industry and teaches business strategy through full-time immersion on a Bain case team. See application for full list of global locations.          As an Associate Consultant Intern (ACI), youll begin with a week of intensive training to learn core consulting skills. You ll work alongside Bain knowledge experts tackling complex business challenges and use your skills to help drive change in a range of organizations from global leaders to start-ups. You ll also have the opportunity to secure a full-time offer to join Bain as an Associate Consultant upon completion of your studies.            WHAT YOU LL DO:            After training, youll be assigned to an active case. Heres a sample of what you can expect to experience and accomplish:      Work on a case team with three to five other consultants, taking charge of a distinct aspect of the project      Interview clients customers, competitors, suppliers and employers work that will become the basis of the case teams strategic recommendations      Own and identify information sources, gather and interpret data, and execute analysis to translate into meaningful insights      Present your findings to case team members and client stakeholders            ABOUT YOU:            To apply, youll need to submit the following items, plus any additional requirements for the main office you wish to join:          Resume/CV (Word doc or PDF files only)      Educational background information      Work experience      Relevant test scores      Strong academic background and analytical skills, high motivation levels, and outstanding interpersonal skills      All majors welcome      Must be a 3rd year on track to graduate by June 2025

column2: a Role & responsibilities     Develop and implement comprehensive behavioural training programs aligned with TNQ's goals and objectives. Conduct training needs assessments to identify skill gaps and development opportunities within TNQ Tech. Design and deliver engaging and interactive training sessions on various behavioural topics such as communication skills, leadership development, conflict resolution, and emotional intelligence. Collaborate with internal stakeholders at TNQ to ensure training programs meet the needs of different departments and levels within the organization. Utilize a variety of training methodologies, including e-learning, classroom training, simulations, and role-playing exercises, to enhance learning effectiveness. Evaluate the effectiveness of training programs at TNQ through feedback, surveys, and performance metrics, and make recommendations for improvement. Provide coaching and support to employees at TNQ to reinforce learning and facilitate behaviour change. Stay updated on the latest trends and best practices in learning and development, and incorporate new techniques and technologies into training programs at TNQ. Maintain training records and documentation to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies at TNQ.  Preferred candidate profile     Educational qualification: Any  Proven experience in designing, delivering, and evaluating behavioural training programs in a corporate setting, preferably within the IT/ITES industry. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Proficiency in both Tamil and English languages Strong understanding of instructional design methodologies. Excellent presentation and facilitation skills, with the ability to engage and inspire diverse audiences. Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams at TNQ and build strong relationships with stakeholders at all levels. Proficiency in learning management systems.    Work location:  Chennai Work mode:  Working from office Working days:  5.5 days a week (Saturday is a half working day, can work from home)
column11: behavioural trainer, behavioural training, Soft Skills Training

column2: Responsibilities: Manage large amounts of inbound and outbound calls in a timely manner Follow communication "scripts" when handling different topics Welcoming the paid users, make sure they log in to the learning portal and start learning by guiding them through the onboarding process. Monitoring learning progress and interacting with students regularly to ensure their learning is greater than 75% by suggesting tips and solutions. Keep records of all conversations in our database in a comprehensible way Respond to customer queries in a timely and accurate way, via phone, email, or chat, WhatsApp, etc., Host and facilitate interactive live sessions, focusing on motivational topics, learning strategies, and community building. Create a supportive and dynamic learning community, encouraging peer-to-peer interaction and collaboration. Ensure that users are actively participating in different activities and making good progress. Communicate users' progress and course-related updates to parents/guardians periodically. Qualifications and Skills: Should be proficient in one of the native languages of  Telugu Proven experience in mentoring, coaching, or customer support roles. Customer focus and adaptability to different personality types Strong verbal communication skills along with active listening Excellent interpersonal skills with a focus on empathy and a positive attitude. Being flexible and outcome-driven is key to adapting to dynamic learning environments and ensuring student success. Ability to multitask, prioritize effectively, and manage time efficiently. Basic proficiency in using digital communication tools and spreadsheets. Work Location :  Work From Home. If required, you need to come to the Hyderabad office. Working days :  6 days a week CTC :  3 LPA + Additional rewards Basic Requirements:  Need to have your own laptop and good internet connection.  Laptop with Webcam is must  Preferably female   No toddlers around, as it involves calling   Some previous work experience in calling is required  Basic English speaking skills  Ready to onboard right away!! Note:  Sometimes, need to work on weekends and will take breaks on weekdays. Need to be flexible. column2: Join Mentor Match as a Customer Success Representative! Job Title:  Customer Success Representative Location:  Chennai, India Shift Time:  Night Shift (10 pm to 7 am) Work Model:  Work from Office (Mon-Sat) Position Overview: Are you a night owl passionate about education? We're searching for a dedicated Customer Success Representative to join our Chennai team on-site. In this pivotal role, you'll ensure customer success and satisfaction during the night shift. Key Responsibilities: Customer      Engagement:  Proactively engage with customers to understand their needs, challenges, and educational objectives, fostering loyalty and trust. Product      Support:  Provide frontline support for customer inquiries,      troubleshooting technical issues, and delivering timely resolutions. End-to-end      Customer Management:  Serve as the primary point of contact between teachers and students, ensuring seamless communication and satisfaction. Account      Management:  Manage customer accounts, identify upselling opportunities, and drive revenue growth to meet targets. Customer      Advocacy:  Advocate for customer needs internally, collaborating with product and marketing teams for continuous improvement. Renewals and Retention:  Drive customer retention, identify expansion opportunities, and ensure satisfaction and loyalty. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business, education, communication, or a related field. 1-2      years of experience in customer success or related roles, preferably in technology or education. Excellent communication skills in English, with the ability to influence stakeholders effectively. Strong problem-solving skills and technical aptitude. Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced startup environment. Passion for education, technology, and positively impacting the Chennai community. Benefits: Competitive salary package with performance-based incentives. Collaborative work culture with ample opportunities for career growth. Professional development programs and ongoing training opportunities. Ready to Shape the Future of Education? Join our passionate team at Mentor Match and make a difference in education. If you're ready to embrace the night shift and be part of our exciting journey, apply now and kickstart your career with us!

column1: Hiring Process Trainer For A Leading IT Service Provider- Navi Mumbai
column2: Urgently Hiring Process Trainer For A Leading IT Service Provider in Navi Mumbai (Ghansoli) Experience: Min 3 Years (2 Years into Domestic BPO/KPO) Shift Time :  24*7 SHIFT and 1 rotational off Notice Period :  Need immediate/1 month only Location:  Navi Mumbai (Ghansoli) ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES  include, but are not limited to, the following:  Review Existing Training Materials and Identify need for updating the same. Should be able to create new content as and when necessary ??Conduct and periodically review contents/initial training material of the initial training of New Hires of the process. ??Develop and conduct Refreshers based on Training needs for existing Agents and help prepare them for the job. ??Using trending data from Quality Assurance reports, create one-on-one or group trainings to resolve training discrepancies. ??Evaluate clients training requirements and establish training goals/completion milestones ??Develop and implement client-specific training programs and material using input from Project Managers, client training materials and Knowledge System contents. ??Coordinate training activities looping in company and client stakeholders. ??Facilitate role-playing, test, certification, and remediation. ??If needed, should be able to assist Human Resources and Call Center Management in participating in the selection process of potential candidates; ??Work with the internal management staff to develop and facilitate motivational activities for the advisors. ??Provide assistance in developing cross-training materials and SOPs, as required; ??Preparation of Training Plans, and relevant Training reports and Dashboards. ??Perform other duties as assigned. ??Ability to work in night/rotation shifts as well. Process could also demand a 6 day working and should be open for it accordingly. Interested candidate kindly share your resume to  riya@smart-source.in Thanks & Regards Riya Binoy HR Consultant

column2: Faculty About Us BYJUS is the world's most valuable Ed-tech company and the creator of Indias most loved School learning app which offers highly adaptive, engaging and effective learning programs For students in classes 1-12(K-12) and competitive exams like JEE, NEET, CAT and IAS. BYJU'S - The Learning App, the flagship product for classes 4-12 was launched in 2015. Today, the app has over 35 million registered students and 2.4millionannual paid subscriptions. With an average time of 71 minutes being spent by a student on the app everyday from1700+cities, the app is creating a whole new way of learning through visual lessons. It is encouraging students to become self-initiated learners. The Disney BYJU'S Early Learn App was launched in June 2019, a special Opening from BYJU'S in collaboration with Disney India for students in classes1-3.The apps have been designed to adapt to the Unique learning style of every student, as per the pace, size, and style of learning. BYJU'S is paving the way for new-age, geography agnostic learning tools that sit at the cross-section of mobile, interactive content and personalized learning methodologies. To know more about the company, please download the apps (Available in Play Store & App store) or visit us at  https://byjus.com/ Our products range from: Learning apps catering to students in India to computer vision and artificial intelligence enabled learning programs across the world( OSMO  - playosmo.com and Byjus.com). Tech enabled learning programs spread across North America, Europe and Australia ( Epic!  - getepic.com). Coding platforms where 50 million users solve puzzles, build games, stories and interactive animations by coding   Tynker   App . Teaching live one-on-one sessions with students across 7 countries Byjus Future School ( WhitehatJr ). In-demand skills to learn and Advance career in AI, ML, Data science, Digital marketing, Cloud, Software engineering ( Great   learning ) Indias top coaching for NEET, IIT-JEE, NTSE, KVPY Olympiad and other competitive exams ( Aakash ) www.byjus.com   Job   Title: Faculty   BYJUS   Home   Tuition We are one of the worlds leading education-media-technology companies and we are making millions fall in love with learning. We are coming up with the next generation of Home Tuitions in India. We are looking for enthusiastic and competent candidates who can think both, in and out of the box, to help students in a more interactive and tech-based environment and make them learn better at their homes. If you are passionate about introducing the ??hink and Learn??concept in more creative ways, here is the right place for you. It?? a great opportunity to work on an important mission and join a fun, talented team.   Job Role:  Faculty for BYJU?? Tuition Centre (Class 4 -10)  Subjects:  Biology/Chemistry/Physics and Mathematics. ( 4th to 10th class) Location:  PAN India Working days & Shift:   6 days/week Timing:  12-9 PM ( May vary as per BTC City ) Weekly Off : Monday Roles and Responsibilities: Teach students as per curriculum and schedule. Monitor student discipline and in-class activity. Discuss homework, resolve in-class doubts and monitor students??progress. Employment Type: Full Time Work from Office (Offline) Qualifications & Experience: B.E/B.Tech/M.Tech/B.Sc/M.Sc/BDS/B.Ed At Least 1+ of teaching experience in Science or Math for grades 4-10 Experience & Skills: Good communication & explanation skills Patient and resilient personality Dedication towards  students and their education Understanding of the National/State Curriculum Location:  At respective BTC Centers Language:  English & Local State Language

column1: Success Coach - Malayalam ( Work From Home)
column2: Responsibilities: Manage large amounts of inbound and outbound calls in a timely manner Follow communication "scripts" when handling different topics Welcoming the paid users, make sure they log in to the learning portal and start learning by guiding them through the onboarding process. Monitoring learning progress and interacting with students regularly to ensure their learning is greater than 75% by suggesting tips and solutions. Keep records of all conversations in our database in a comprehensible way Respond to customer queries in a timely and accurate way, via phone, email, or chat, WhatsApp, etc., Host and facilitate interactive live sessions, focusing on motivational topics, learning strategies, and community building. Create a supportive and dynamic learning community, encouraging peer-to-peer interaction and collaboration. Ensure that users are actively participating in different activities and making good progress. Communicate users' progress and course-related updates to parents/guardians periodically. Qualifications and Skills: Should be proficient in one of the native languages of  Malayalam Proven experience in mentoring, coaching, or customer support roles. Customer focus and adaptability to different personality types Strong verbal communication skills along with active listening Excellent interpersonal skills with a focus on empathy and a positive attitude. Being flexible and outcome-driven is key to adapting to dynamic learning environments and ensuring student success. Ability to multitask, prioritize effectively, and manage time efficiently. Basic proficiency in using digital communication tools and spreadsheets. Work Location :  Work From Home. If required, you need to come to the Hyderabad office. Working days :  6 days a week CTC :  3 LPA + Additional rewards Basic Requirements:  Need to have your own laptop and good internet connection.  Laptop with Webcam is must  Preferably female   No toddlers around, as it involves calling   Some previous work experience in calling is required  Basic English speaking skills  Ready to onboard right away!! Note:  Sometimes, need to work on weekends and will take breaks on weekdays. Need to be flexible.   What's app community Link: To take your first step for hiring process, Join our community now   https://chat.whatsapp.com/HqrC3Z5Q8A9DK9MmQXIDqZ
