column2: Role Description This is a full-time on-site role for a Speech Language Pathologist at Ray of Hope Center for Autism located in Hosur. The Speech Language Pathologist will perform assessments, diagnosis, and treatment of communication disorders. They will also diagnose and treat dysphagia and work with individuals with language disorders. The Speech Language Pathologist will work collaboratively with other professionals to provide coordinated care to children with autism and related disabilities. Qualifications Speech Therapy and Speech skills Experience in diagnosing and treating dysphagia and communication disorders Experience in working with individuals with language disorders Excellent written and verbal communication skills Ability to work collaboratively with a multidisciplinary team Experience with Autism Spectrum Disorders is preferred Bachelor's degree in Speech Language Pathology or related field

column2: About Art Beat:  Art Beat is a 5-star rated Art School in HSR Layout, Bangalore. Our unique curriculum uses technology & art to teach kids.  We are currently hiring Art Teacher at our centre in HSR, Bangalore. Mandatory requirement - You should be available to work full-time at our centre for a minimum of 1 year.? Please do not apply?if you are not available to work offline or if you are not available to work for 1 full year.? Our primary approach is to offer safe and structured activities in age-appropriate environments where children are encouraged to learn, play, explore and discover. Our aim is to help each child realize his or her hidden potential that appears enveloped even after attending school We are looking for passionate teachers who can help us build a strong community of budding artists. You can apply even if you are a fresher provided you are skilled in different forms of art. Roles & responsibilities Teachadults & kids from different age groups as per the art school curriculum Offline. Plan and prepare worksheets, and access the art worksheet online on Google classroom. Share periodic feedback to kids about their artwork.? Teach allocated students by planning their teaching to achieve progress as per the curriculum. Providing clear structures for lessons maintaining pace, motivation and challenge. Ensuring effective teaching and the best use of available time. Maintaining discipline in accordance with the school's procedures and encouraging good practice with regard to punctuality, behaviour, standards of work. Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications You should be available to work full-time at our centre for a minimum of 1 year. Needs to have a background in Art/Fine Arts. Self-taught artists are also welcome.? Looking for full-time art teachers. Excellent communication skills Prior experience in an Art school or a pre-school is a plus. You can apply even if you are a fresher provided you are skilled in different forms of art. Benefits Working hours - Monday to Saturday 11 am to 7 pm. Alternate Sunday will be working. Alternate Sundays are working. Monday will be the compensatory off if they work on a Sunday.? Women driven organization? Incentives to match the potential Be a part of an inspiring team that has grown even during Covid-19

column2: As a Faculty at DPMI, you will contribute to our students in studying Diploma/Certification/Degree Programs. You will be required to prepare and deliver lectures online & offline, practical classes and student support, as will have responsibility for setting and marking assessments and exams. The opportunity exists for a suitably experienced candidate to contribute to the delivery of associated subjects. You will be required to fulfil administrative and leadership roles associated with teaching. Teaching and learning support  Transfer knowledge in the form of practical skills, methods and techniques to the students. Identify learning needs of students and define appropriate learning objectives.  Design teaching material and deliver either across a range of modules or within a subject area.  Ensure that content, methods of delivery and learning materials will meet the defined learning objectives.  Develop the skills of applying appropriate approaches to teaching.  Challenge thinking, foster debate and develop the ability of students to engage in critical discourse and rational thinking.  Provide students with frequent, timely assessment of and clear feedback regarding academic performance. Appropriately document student progress and maintain accurate records such as attendance, grading and achievement of student learning outcomes. Supervise the work of students, provide advice on study skills and help them with learning problems.  Select appropriate assessment instruments and criteria, assess the work and progress of students by reference to the criteria and provide constructive feedback to students. Seek ways of improving performance by reflecting on teaching design and delivery and obtaining and analyzing feedback. Contribute to the planning, design and development of objectives and material including modules and programs.  Support and promote the college and departmental missions centered on excellence in teaching and learning through quality instruction, curriculum enhancement, and service. Collaborate with department chair, faculty, and peers to evaluate, revise, and develop curriculum to cultivate the mastery of course content. Essential Skills  Should have an in-depth knowledge of the subject. Should have a passion for teaching the students and understanding their educational requirements.  Should be able to grasp the complex information and convey the same to the students in a simplified form.  Should be able to advice and counsel the students on their career prospects. Should have a dedicated and committed power to continuously recommend suggestions      to improve the curriculum and general discipline. Should have excellent time management and organizational skills along with computer proficiency.

column1: doctoral Fellowship in Neuro Critical Care
column2: St.Johns National Academy of Health Sciences is looking for doctoral Fellowship in Neuro Critical Care to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Duration: Doctoral fellowships in neuro critical care can vary in duration but typically last for several years, depending on the program and the specific doctoral degree pursued (eg, PhD, DNSc, or similar)      Research Focus: The program emphasizes research and scholarship in the field of neurocritical care      Fellows are expected to conduct original research, contribute to the scientific understanding of neurocritical care, and produce a doctoral dissertation or thesis      Clinical Experience: Some programs may include a clinical component where fellows work with critically ill patients in a neurocritical care setting      This hands-on experience is valuable for understanding patient care and gaining practical skills      Coursework: Depending on the program, fellows may be required to complete relevant coursework in areas such as neuroscience, critical care, research methods, and statistics      Supervision: Fellows are typically assigned a faculty advisor or mentor who guides them through their research and academic journey      This mentor plays a crucial role in providing support and expertise        Responsibilities and Expectations:        Research: Conduct original research in the field of neurocritical care      This may involve data collection, data analysis, literature reviews, and the development of research proposals      Publishing: Contribute to academic publications by writing research papers and manuscripts for peer-reviewed journals      Dissertation/Thesis: Develop and defend a doctoral dissertation or thesis that presents the findings of the research conducted during the fellowship      Academic Engagement: Attend academic conferences, seminars, and lectures related to neurocritical care to stay updated on the latest advancements and network with professionals in the field      Teaching: Depending on the program, some doctoral fellows may be required to assist with teaching responsibilities, such as leading seminars or mentoring undergraduate or master's students      Clinical Practice: If a clinical component is included, fellows may participate in patient care, including diagnosis, treatment, and monitoring of patients in neurocritical care settings

column1: Teaching Associate For Municipal Finance - Digital Blended Learning (D
column2: About the Digital Blended Learning programme at IIHS Digital Blended Learning is recognised as a strategically important area of growth at IIHS. The?vision for the IIHS Digital Blended Learning programme is ambitious, and involves the creation of a portfolio of Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs) and other online/blended learning offerings spanning a range of subjects relevant to the study of the Urban, for both domestic and international audiences. Job Description IIHS is looking for a teaching associate to build a portfolio of short-term and long-term courses and knowledge products in Municipal Finance in India for middle and senior governmental officials and students and sector professionals. This is a contractual engagement for an initial term of 11 months, renewable on mutual consent. Activities and Tasks Detailed responsibilities would include, but not be limited to, the following broad areas: Working closely with established experts in Municipal Finance to create online learning modules and courses on various aspects of the subject; Designing short classroom-based courses on different topics around Municipal Finance for government officials and sectoral experts; Researching the subject to create teaching material, cases, readings, worksheets, assessments and assignments on the topic; Identifying researchers, faculty and sectoral experts who can be involved as visiting faculty, guest speakers and panelists in the various programmes; Teaching in the different Municipal Finance courses designed and offered by IIHS over time; Providing support to other IIHS activities including academics, research, training, practice, operations and others; Participating in all activities of Institution-Building at IIHS; carrying out tasks as assigned by IIHS; and traveling on IIHS work within or outside the country as and when needed. Structure and Reporting The teaching associate will be an External Consultant coordinating with the Head  DBL at IIHS, or with any other person designated by the Head, and will be required to collaborate effectively with a diverse group of internal teams and external individuals/organizations, and students. Person Specification The ideal candidate should have: A Masters degree or higher in Finance / Economics / Public Administration / Public Policy; At least 3 years of experience with an academic or training institution, research organization, think-tank or consulting firm; experience as a faculty or researcher in the domain will be an added advantage. Deep research orientation, including a strong interest in going deeper into the understanding of Municipal Finance; Interest in teaching and capacity building; Excellent communication skills, spoken and written; Ability to work with and across teams in a matrix structure. This is a contractual engagement for an initial term of 11 months, renewable on mutual consent. This offer is on an exclusive basis, which implies that other professional assignments (whether compensated or not) that bear a potential conflict of interest with IIHS cannot be undertaken. The search will remain open until the position is filled. Location This position is based in New Delhi and may entail travel to other locations in India. Review and Assessment The role and performance of the incumbent shall be subject to normal review and assessment systems at IIHS. Diversity Policy IIHS is an equal opportunity employer that encourages women, people with disabilities and those from economically and socially excluded communities with the requisite skills and qualifications to apply for positions. Contact Please write to us at  hr@iihs.co.in  if you need any clarifications while filling the online application form.
column11: Classroom Training, Teaching

column2: Role & responsibilities     We are looking for a dynamic Associate  Training and Placement to join our team. In this role, you will collaborate with students, recruiters, and other teams to monitor student progress, provide feedback, assist with career development, and align students with suitable job roles and employment opportunities. Job Function: Student Progress Monitoring: Monitor and assess the academic and career progress of students. Provide regular feedback to students to enhance their employability. Career Development Assistance: Assist students in resume building, interview preparation, and job search strategies. Offer guidance to help students achieve their career aspirations. Alignment of Job Roles: Work with students to identify their strengths and interests. Match students with suitable job roles and employment opportunities. Collaboration: Efficiently collaborate with students, recruiters, and cross-functional teams to ensure the smooth execution of placement activities and events.? Organize collaborative events, workshops, masterclasses, super sessions, placement drives, and outreach initiatives to facilitate networking opportunities for students and engage industry leaders, potentially creating hiring prospects with streamlined coordination. Skills Required: Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written communication skills are essential for effective interaction with students and other stakeholders. Career Guidance: A passion for guiding and mentoring students in their career development. Interpersonal Skills: Excellent interpersonal skills to build rapport with students and collaborate with teams. Analytical Skills: Ability to assess student progress and align job roles with their skills and aspirations. Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in Google Workspace (Sheets, Docs, Slides, etc.) is required. Experience: Prior experience in career counseling, training, or placement services is a plus. Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: IIHS is looking for a teaching associate to build a portfolio of short-term and long-term courses and knowledge products in Municipal Finance in India for middle and senior governmental officials and students and sector professionals.     This is a contractual engagement for an initial term of 11 months, renewable on mutual consent.         Activities and Tasks       Detailed responsibilities would include, but not be limited to, the following broad areas:       Working closely with established experts in Municipal Finance to create online learning modules and courses on various aspects of the subject;         Designing short classroom-based courses on different topics around Municipal Finance for government officials and sectoral experts;         Researching the subject to create teaching material, cases, readings, worksheets, assessments and assignments on the topic;         Identifying researchers, faculty and sectoral experts who can be involved as visiting faculty, guest speakers and panelists in the various programmes;         Teaching in the different Municipal Finance courses designed and offered by IIHS over time;         Providing support to other IIHS activities including academics, research, training, practice, operations and others;         Participating in all activities of Institution-Building at IIHS; carrying out tasks as assigned by IIHS; and traveling on IIHS work within or outside the country as and when needed.         Structure and Reporting        The teaching associate will be an External Consultant coordinating with the Head DBL at IIHS, or with any other person designated by the Head, and will be required to collaborate effectively with a diverse group of internal teams and external individuals/organizations, and students.       Person Specification       The ideal candidate should have:       A Master s degree or higher in Finance / Economics / Public Administration / Public Policy;         At least 3 years of experience with an academic or training institution, research organization, think-tank or consulting firm; experience as a faculty or researcher in the domain will be an added advantage.         Deep research orientation, including a strong interest in going deeper into the understanding of Municipal Finance;         Interest in teaching and capacity building;         Excellent communication skills, spoken and written;         Ability to work with and across teams in a matrix structure.

column2: The overall goal of the proposed Khushal Bachpan: Promoting Happy Childhood is Children in the project locations lead safe, happy and dignified childhood with enabling environment promoting easy access to their rights      Program revolves around children and the families      Focus of the program is to ensure rights of children through strengthening of families      Project promotes local level child ambassadors to voice the issues at the district levels      Further, the project shall organize campaigns to generate momentum around the issue of child rights and education which shall lead to proactive measures by the state to effectively implement the policies      Project will be adopting a household intensive holistic approach and will be working in all domains of child rights including income generation activities so as to increase the livelihood income of families                Pre-requisite for this role        :          This role demands the district program associate to be stationed at one of the villages where the project is being implemented. This will be the primary and mandatory condition for this role.      Candidate is supposed to have a two-wheeler, should know how to drive, and should have valid two-wheeler driving licence.      Candidate should know how to write reports and case studies (either in Hindi or else in English)      Candidate should have knowledge and experience of developing budgets and tracking of the same.            Key Responsibilities        :          Develop Project Implementation Plans (PIP s) in close coordination with Program Associate. Ensuring timely delivery of Project plan with program quality.      Develop Family Development Plan (FDP) for each household who are enrolled under the Project with the support from Community Educators and ensuring updation of the same on yearly basis.          Developing plans for business (BDP) and execute income generation activities making sure sustainability of the IGA implemented.          Keeping a track on education status of children as well as making sure the SHG are linked with various social security schemes.      Analysing existing source of income of families as well as skill set. Proposing income generation activities for the families and implementation of the same.      Providing hand holding support to the community educators and develop plan for them on monthly basis and review of the same.          Bringing on board the Academic Mentors for the location and be successful in running academic support classes as well as playing a lead role in establishing and running child friendly libraries.      Keep a track on the budget for the district and ensuring quality as well as timely implementation of Project.          Liasoning with district level officials and all line departments for leveraging government funds and linking families with social security schemes.      Ensuring grading of Self Hep Groups and monitoring the performance of SHG s.      Coordinate and Organize trainings/capacity building and strategic guidance to community educators as per the requirement of the program.          Design and implementation of campaigns on child rights and thematic areas specific to district.      Develop systems and structures at the district level for process documentation and registration.      Ensure logistic support toward the trainings and other program events.          Facilitate the Participatory Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation of Khushaal Bachpan programme, including process documentation.          Participating in the cluster level, regional level meetings, workshops, reflections, for learning and incorporation of the same into operations.      Assist program associate to develop training modules / manuals.      Motivate the children and their parents/caregivers to enroll and reintegrate with the schooling system.      Strengthen the School Management Committees (SMC), School level committees with the participation of community and teachers mandated by the government, so that they can deal with the cases of drop out and absenteeism and quality of education.          Establishment of Bal Choupals across all the villages and conducting various activities with children on Education, Life Skills, Child Participation and many more.      Ensuring monitoring and quality of academic support classes run under the program and tracking the progress of children.

column2: Soft Skills Trainer (Male)   UCIT Programme   Organization: Udayan Care Location: Jogeshwari west, Prabhat Nagar, Mumbai Reports to: Assistant Director   About Udayan Care Udayan Care, an ISO 9000-certified organization, has been working for the quality care of disadvantaged children and women, and youth for over 29 years, with the endeavor of making young lives shine. The mission of A nurturing home for every orphaned child; an opportunity for higher education for every girl and for every adult; the dignity of self-reliance and the desire to give back to society??drives its employees to action. UC advocates and influences policy change in the alternative care space, by researching and creating evidence, training functionaries, and developing policy briefs, and research papers.  UC has been accredited by Give India and Credibility Alliance for its transparent and credible performance. Udayan Care is registered with NITI Aayog?? NGO Darpan. It has been a recipient of the prestigious National Award for Child Welfare by the President of India in 2014. For more details, please visit  www.udayancare.org   Purpose of the Role Under supervision of the HOD, the Soft Skills Facilitator assumes responsibility for the facilitation of Soft Skills Training offered at Udayan Care. He/she will follow the prescribed curriculum/calendar of activities that are designed to develop the soft skills of the students. This is done to increase their skill level in order to secure employment. This is inclusive of mock job interviews, job counseling to students, sensitivity awareness and training for existing and potential employees in the center. Key Responsibilities  Plan, organize, and administer the prescribed curriculum with the support of the IT Programme Coordinator.  Facilitate day-to-day classes to assist students in gaining knowledge and soft skills needed to secure employment.  Conduct classes in an atmosphere that promotes caring and respect in accordance with the Mission and Vision of Udayan Care.  Impart Training on communication, intercultural or interpersonal skills, workplace readiness, behavioral and personality development etc.  Assess and evaluate students for their proficiency, comprehension, familiarity with the course/subject, job-readiness.  Lead, Support & Facilitate Student selection, enrollment and placement efforts along with other center personnel; Student Counseling.  Prepare and submit written weekly reports to the Head of the Programme.  Work closely with the IT Programme Coordinator and HOD of the Programme.  Plan and implement educational activities, co-curricular activities, large and small group workshops, social service activities, annual day celebration and events at the center.  Instruct students in job seeking, application procedures, resume writing, interview preparation and job retention skills and attitudes.  Ensure the delivery of services which are reflective of an Independent Living, self-sufficiency, and empowerment.  Maintain necessary documentation for the center records, billing and organizing programme activities Experience & Qualification  Graduate or postgraduate in any stream.   6 to 24 months of work experience in a relevant field. Preferably in the NGO Sector.  Prior Experience in leading an NGO in programme implementation or teaching will be preferred.  Relevant Training Certification in Soft Skills Skills and knowledge  Strong interpersonal skills and social values.  Should demonstrate patience & perseverance.  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills  Excellent written and verbal communications skills.  Zeal to work in the community.   How to Apply:  Please download and fill the Application form and send to hrd@udayancare.org and  recruitment@udayancare.org  along with your updated C.V.    Clause: Child Protection and Safeguarding Policy: Any employee, consultant, contractor, supplier, vendor, or resource person, shall read, be aware and sign to comply strictly with the Child Protection Policy, the Safeguarding Policy, and all accompanying policies of Udayan Care. Udayan Care gives the highest priority to its commitment to creating awareness, ensuring prevention, reporting, and response to all disclosures of abuse, violence, neglect, or exploitation or its threat for all children, young persons, and vulnerable adults that the organization is in contact with. Our CIRCA values, Code of Conduct and HR norms clearly regulate and ensure the implementation of the highest standards towards zero tolerance of any safeguarding concerns.

column2: Overview: As a Physics Teacher specializing in Aviation Instruction, you will play a crucial role in educating aspiring pilots and aviation professionals on the fundamental principles of physics relevant to flight. You will design and deliver engaging lesson plans that integrate theoretical concepts with practical applications in aviation. Through hands-on demonstrations, simulations, and real-world examples, you will inspire students to understand and apply physics principles to aircraft operations, aerodynamics, navigation, and flight safety. Responsibilities: 1. Curriculum Development: Develop and refine curriculum materials for physics courses tailored to aviation students. Ensure alignment with aviation industry standards, certification requirements, and educational objectives. 2. Instruction Delivery: Deliver dynamic and interactive classroom lectures, discussions, and demonstrations to engage students in the study of physics concepts related to aviation. Utilize multimedia resources, simulations, and laboratory experiments to enhance learning experiences. 3. Application of Physics in Aviation: Illustrate how physics principles such as Newton's laws of motion, fluid dynamics, and aerodynamics apply to various aspects of aviation, including aircraft performance, stability, control, and navigation. 4. Assessment and Feedback: Evaluate student performance through quizzes, exams, projects, and practical assessments. Provide constructive feedback and guidance to support student learning and academic progress. 5. Safety and Compliance: Emphasize the importance of safety protocols, regulations, and best practices in aviation physics. Instill a culture of safety awareness and compliance among students to promote responsible aviation practices. 6. Collaboration and Support: Collaborate with colleagues, aviation industry experts, and educational stakeholders to enhance the quality and relevance of physics instruction for aviation students. Provide mentorship and support to students pursuing careers in aviation. Requirements: 1. Education: Bachelors degree in Physics, Aeronautical Engineering, or a related field required.  2. Teaching Experience: Previous experience teaching physics at the high school level preferred.  3. Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to convey complex physics concepts in a clear and accessible manner. Proficiency in using multimedia tools and technology for instructional purposes. 4. Passion for Teaching: Enthusiasm for educating and mentoring students in the field of aviation physics. Ability to inspire curiosity, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills. 5. Adaptability: Flexibility to adjust teaching strategies and instructional methods based on student needs, learning styles, and classroom dynamics. 6. Organizational Skills: Strong organizational skills with the ability to plan, prepare, and deliver effective instructional materials and assessments. Attention to detail in grading assignments and providing feedback. 7. Professionalism: Commitment to upholding ethical standards, academic integrity, and professional conduct. Respect for diverse perspectives and cultural backgrounds among students and colleagues. This job description outlines the key responsibilities and requirements for the role of a Physics Teacher specializing in Aviation Instruction. The successful candidate will have a passion for teaching, a strong background in physics, and a deep understanding of how physics principles apply to the field of aviation. Join us at JAG Aviation and contribute to shaping the future of aviation awareness! Be an integral part of our journey. If you are a dynamic individual with a passion for marketing and sales in a startup setting, sky is the limit for you! Perks and benefits  Work timings are Monday to Friday at Office.  48 hours a week.  Monthly one paid leave along with annual bonus and one team outing.  Performance based out of turn incentives.

column2: Role & responsibilities   Deliver engaging lectures, Case Studies, Experiments and Projects and practical training sessions on Solar PV/ battery-powered vehicle propulsion systems, following the curriculum outlined in course descriptions. Preparing Course curriculum, Handbooks, Papers, Presentation, Manuals etc. For successful execution of training / Specialization Programs. Incorporate your own personal EV/ Solar field experiences into the class when answering student questions. Provide comprehensive instruction on the theory and basic design aspects of battery-powered vehicle propulsion systems, covering topics such as high voltage batteries, regenerative braking, and electric machine motor types. Emphasize safety protocols and procedures related to EV and hybrid maintenance, diagnostics, and EV battery systems. Instruct students on the operation of electric vehicle traction motors, including their types, functionality, and applications in electric vehicles. Cover power management, power inverters, AC to DC converters, and accessory systems, enabling students to comprehend the intricacies of power systems in electric vehicles. Conducting Mobilization and Awareness drive for various training program. Responsible for delivery of Hands On session delivery, Project based learning. Ensure the timely processing of classes, projects, assignments, internship and placements. Conduction of workshop, Training, Internship program (Offline / Online) at various locations, apart from their centres. Follow up with concern engineering institutions on outcomes and track proposal success ratio. Deliver the expert lecture/talk on EV module & project. Mentor and support the engineering students/professionals for EV projects as per course curriculum. Resolving Technical Queries, Counselling and Orientation, Webinars for Fresh Admissions. Maintaining the records of performance, evaluation, conduction of assessment, preparation for Job Interviews, Internship etc. Ensuring quality, execution and feedback of programs. Provide technical evaluation and support to assist client service/project managers. Perform related duties as assigned. At least one-year experience as a trainer. Have a wealth of practical knowledge of EV Systems / Solar systems and the passion to want to share this knowledge through training and development. Strong Theoretical and Practical knowledge about EV and HEV System and Subsystems. Excellency in Model Based Development for EV with proficient skills in MATLAB Simulink, ANSYS, and Solid Works Etc. Excellency in Model Based Development for EV with proficient skills in MATLAB Simulink, ANSYS, and Solid Works Etc. column2: Role & responsibilities     As an engineer at CADD Centre, your role involves conducting training sessions for both students and professionals in designated software skills. You provide guidance and support to learners to enhance their understanding and proficiency in the subject matter. Ensuring effective delivery of course content, you maintain high-quality standards in training, fostering an environment conducive to learning and skill development. Preferred candidate profile   Mechanical Field: Candidates must hold a Bachelor's degree (B.E/B.Tech) or a Master's (M.E/M.Tech) or a Diploma in Mechanical, Automobile, Aviation, or Production Engineering. Proficiency in a minimum of two software applications, selected from AutoCAD, PRO-E/Creo, SolidWorks, CATIA, NX/Unigraphics, and Ansys, is required. Civil Field: A Bachelor's degree (B.E/B.Tech/B.Arch) or a Master's (M.E/M.Tech) or a Diploma in Civil, Architectural, Structural, or Interior Designing is mandatory. Competence in at least two software programs such as AutoCAD, Revit/3ds Max, Sketchup, Primavera, BIM, Staad Pro., and E-Tabs is essential. Electrical Field: Candidates should possess a Bachelor's degree (B.E/B.Tech/B.Arch) or a Master's (M.E/M.Tech) or a Diploma in Electrical Engineering. Proficiency in a minimum of two software programs such as AutoCAD, AutoCAD Electrical, Revit MEP, PLC & SCADA, ETAP, or any two IT-related software mentioned below is required. Electronics Field: A Bachelor's degree (B.E/B.Tech/B.Arch) or a Master's (M.E/M.Tech) or a Diploma in Electronics / Electronics & Communication is required. Competence in at least two software programs such as AutoCAD, OrCAD, Microcontroller or at least any two IT-related software mentioned below is necessary. IT Field: Candidates must possess a Bachelor's degree (B.E/B.Tech/BCA/B.Sc) or a Master's degree (M.E/M.Tech/MCA/M.Sc) or a Diploma in Computer Science & Related Domains. Proficiency in a minimum of two programming languages or tools, including C, C++, Python, Java, Advanced Java, Full Stack (MEAN/MERN), Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, and ML, is mandatory. Business Field: A Bachelor's degree (BBA/B.Com) or a Master's degree (M.Com/MBA) is required. Proficiency in at least two software applications such as MS-Office, Tally, and Project Management, Digital Marketing, SAP is necessary. Perks and benefits   Flexible schedule Overtime pay Performance bonus Yearly Salary Revision

column2: Wonksknow Technologies India Private Limited, a subsidiary of Wonksknow LLC USA, is looking for highly energetic and talented Computer Science and Electronics Engineers for a challenging role as a Programming Instructor and Developer. The role also involves development of promising and innovative software applications in the  EdOptim  and  RaiseHand  suite of products. YoungWonks is very selective and the acceptance rate for this profile is less than 5%. Rigorous training is provided to the selected candidates. This is a full-time role. YoungWonks trainer and developer salaries are very competitive.  This will be a Work from Home position which requires strong Wi-Fi connection with power backup and professional set up. Role & responsibilities     Participate in testing, development and updates of YoungWonks, ProWonks curriculum or any other client of WONKSKNOW Technologies India Private Limited. Participate and complete in group/individual coding exercises. Conduct webinars, co-ordinate student led webinars and represent the organization in different tech events. Contribute in various development projects. Key Requirements Excellent communication skills. Excellent clarity of thought. Someone who can explain complex concepts in simple ways. Excellent listening skills. Will need to be incredibly patient. Incredible customer service skills. Keen attention to detail. Familiarity with at least one object oriented programming language. Knowledge of Java is mandatory. Knowledge of Android development and Flutter is preferred but not required. 4 years Bachelors degree in a technical field or a Masters degree in any Science, Mathematics or Technical fields is required. Flexible to work in night shifts. Ability to self-learn. Confident and friendly. Apply only if you feel you are passionate about teaching and want to make a difference in the lives of students who will be the inventors of the future.

column2: The Master Teacher is the backbone of Avanti s classroom responsible for the end-to-end operations for one Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya school including teaching, inspiring, training and motivating students towards achieving their learning goals. We are looking of Teachers having 4-6 years of experience in Teaching(JEE Advance/NEET level)        Key responsibilities include, but are not limited to:        Following are the major responsibilities that could change as per demand of the dynamic work requirements.        The role of a Master Teacher involves the following tasks, functions and responsibilities:        Prepare for classroom sessions with Presentation Slides in advance and teach students for ~30 hours a week using Avanti s unique pedagogy in which students discuss conceptual questions with peers and work collaboratively on problem sets/assignments      Explains concepts with clarity in a creative interesting way using real life examples.      Actively monitor students progress, their classwork and homework to ensure that they are on track to achieving their learning goals      2. Training Orient new hires about Avanti Pedagogy and introduce them to teaching process      Conduct training sessions to new hires and help them improve in teaching skills and maintain the training notes      3. Mentoring, Career Guidance and Academic Support Build strong relationships with students through one-on-one interaction sessions, helping students overcome their problems both academic and personal in the process      Regularly work with students to break down their academic workload into small achievable goals; Track their progress on these goals      Debrief with students regularly on their test scores and classroom performance (both CBSE board and Avanti); suggesting ideas for improvement      Enable students to chalk out their future career paths by providing them with information about different options available to them based on their strengths and interests      4. Parent Engagement Discuss student performance with their parents in person or over phone at least once a month.      Conduct Parent Teacher Meetings(PTMs) in schools at least once every 3 months and share aggregate and individual reports on student performance with parents      5. Data Analysis Consistently collect and upload feedback about classroom and test performance on Avanti s online learning management system      Generate insights on reasons for poor student performance; devise solutions to address those problems      6. Additional Initiatives Create a healthy learning culture by working on initiatives like (but not limited to) arranging expert guest sessions, organizing field trips/excursions, planning scientific debates in the classroom, etc.      Full time degree in M.Sc./ B.E./B.Tech/M.Tech      Proficiency in Class XI XII Physics/Chemistry/Maths/Biology (one subject). Experience required is 4-6 years teaching JEE/NEET level.

column2: Responsibilities: Strategic Leadership : Provide visionary leadership for the Optometry department,        setting strategic goals and objectives in alignment with the university's mission and vision. Academic Excellence : Oversee the development and delivery of high-quality academic  programs in Optometry, ensuring adherence to accreditation standards and promoting excellence in teaching, research and clinical practice. Curriculum Development:  Lead the design, review, and enhancement of the Optometry curriculum to meet industry trends, technological advancements, and the evolving needs of students and stakeholders. Faculty Managemen t: Recruit, develop, and retain a diverse team of faculty members, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous professional growth. Student Success : Implement strategies to support student success and retention, providing mentorship, guidance, and resources to enhance the learning experience and promote academic achievement. Clinical Practice Oversight : Oversee the operation and management of clinical facilities and practices affiliated with the Optometry department, ensuring the delivery of high-quality patient care and services. Research and Scholarship : Promote a culture of research and scholarship within the Optometry department, supporting faculty and students in conducting innovative research projects and disseminating findings through publications and presentations. Community Engagement : Foster partnerships and collaborations with external stakeholders, including healthcare organizations, industry partners, and community agencies, to enhance experiential learning opportunities, research collaborations, and outreach initiatives. Accreditation and Compliance : Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and accreditation standards relevant to Optometry education and clinical practice, maintaining documentation and facilitating accreditation reviews as needed. Budget and Resource Management : Develop and manage departmental budgets, allocating resources effectively to support academic programs, research activities, and clinical operations. Professional Development : Stay abreast of developments in the field of Optometry, participating in professional organizations, attending conferences, and pursuing opportunities for professional development to enhance departmental effectiveness and expertise. Collaborative Leadership : Collaborate with other departments, schools, and units within the university to promote interdisciplinary research, education, and clinical initiatives that advance the university's mission and strategic priorities. Requirements : - Doctor of Optometry (OD) degree from an accredited institution or advanced degree (e.g., PhD)     Knowledge of  ??Vision examination ??Refraction- Subjective and objective ??Slit- lamp examination ??Low vision evaluation ??Contact lens fitting ??Binocular vision evaluation ??Diagnostic department and instruments - Demonstrated leadership experience in academic administration, preferably in a higher     education setting. - Proven track record of excellence in teaching, research, and/or clinical practice in Optometry. - Strong interpersonal, communication, and organizational skills. - Ability to effectively lead and manage faculty, staff, and resources to achieve departmental     goals and objectives. - Commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion in education and clinical practice. - Familiarity with accreditation standards and regulatory requirements relevant to Optometry    education and clinical practice. Suitable candidates can share their resumes to dewakar.o@randstad.in

column2: DELHI WORLD PUBLIC SCHOOL is looking for Kindergarten Teachers: NTT/ Montessori trained teachers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey        An Early Years or Kindergarten Teacher is an educator who specializes in teaching and caring for young children between the ages of 3 and 6 years old        They play a crucial role in providing a nurturing and educational environment for children during their early developmental years        Here are some key responsibilities and tasks typically associated with the role of an Early Years or Kindergarten Teacher:      Curriculum development: The teacher plans and implements developmentally appropriate curriculum and lesson plans that stimulate children's social, emotional, cognitive, and physical development      They create engaging activities that promote learning through play and exploration      Classroom management: The teacher creates a positive and inclusive classroom environment that supports children's learning and well-being      They establish routines, manage behavior, and promote positive social interactions among children      Individualized instruction: The teacher recognizes and addresses the unique learning needs and abilities of each child      They adapt teaching strategies and provide individualized support to ensure that all children can actively participate and make progress in their learning      Assessment and progress tracking: The teacher assesses children's development and progress through observations, informal assessments, and documentation of their work and achievements      They use this information to plan further learning experiences and communicate progress to parents or guardians      Parent communication and involvement: The teacher maintains regular communication with parents or guardians to keep them informed about their child's learning and development      They conduct parent-teacher conferences, share progress reports, and provide suggestions for supporting children's learning at home

column2: JOB TITLE: ACADEMIC MENTOR JOB ROLE:   An academic mentor is a professional who works to support students in their academic and personal development. They play a crucial role in helping students achieve their educational goals and maximize their learning potential.  RESPONSIBILITIES:   Assist students in understanding and mastering various academic subjects. Help them develop effective study skills, time management strategies, and organizational techniques.    MONITOR PROGRESS:  Track and assess students' academic progress regularly. Analyse test results, assignments, and coursework to identify areas for improvement. Provide feedback to students, parents, and teachers regarding performance and suggest strategies for improvement. RESOURCE COORDINATION:  Help students access educational resources, such as textbooks, online materials, research databases, and tutoring services. Assist with the organization of study groups, workshops, and academic events.

column2: Job description About Us We are a team of 50 Psychologists with the passion to work on child's developmental & behavioral aspects by catering to each child's need. Our vision is to make each special needs child independent by utilizing our psychological skills & inclusive interventions. First Assignment  - Shadow Teaching Assist a child (client diagnosed with Autism or ADHD or Learning disability) in his/her school (during school hours) with targeted intervention strategies to improve skills in the domains of behavior, concentration, academic & social skills. Daily reports will be sent to parents regarding the behavior & performance of the child at school and the intervention strategies used by the shadow teacher. _ Later assignment  - One on one Remedial/Therapy/Counseling sessions After observing the shadow assignment, based on the employee's performance and skillsets, she will be given additional assignments such as Remedial/Therapy/Counseling sessions. The professional will independently conduct sessions with the guidance of the seniors _ Required Candidate profile Passion for working with children, background in Psychology  or experience/passion for working with special needs children, patience, calm nature, Good communication skills, good relationship skills with parents & school teachers, good written and spoken English proficiency. Preferred Qualification- Masters in Psychology or Bachelors in Psychology, Diploma or relevant degree in Special Education  * Only Female candidates preferred. Interested candidates can send their resumes on careers@starlitservices.com

Teach post graduate courses in Management and related subjects. Develop and implement innovative teaching methods and materials. Conduct high-quality research and publish in reputable journals. Mentor and advise students on academic and career development. Participate in curriculum development and academic planning. Engage in departmental and institutional service activities.   Assistant Professor: A Ph.D. / MBA/ PGDM in Management or a closely related field from a recognized university. Demonstrated excellence in teaching and research. Ability to collaborate effectively with colleagues and students.   Associate Professor: A Ph.D. in Management or a closely related field from a recognized  university. Significant teaching experience at the university level. Strong record of research and publications in peer-reviewed  journals. Experience in academic leadership roles and curriculum development.

column2: Secondary SST(Hist/Geog) Teacher Overview The quality of school education available to students from low-income communities across India is abysmal. Their chances of getting admitted to a college or building a career are much lower than their high-income peers, condemning them to a life without voice or choice.?iTeach was born to declare war on this status quo and create a level playing field for ALL children.?We do this in Pune and Navi Mumbai by co-creating contextual school models with Municipal Corporations. We run 10 free and high-impact secondary schools and a college-to-career program for the most disadvantaged students. In 2024, with a staff of 250 members across 10 schools, we will serve 3000 students and 2000 alumni - giving students a fighting chance at college, career, and citizenship. We aim to grow to 30 schools and 10,000 students over the next five years.? Take a peek into our world by following the link here: https://www.iteachschools.org/ Key Responsibilities: A teacher at iTeach Schools wears multiple hats to ensure an excellent education for their students. The three different parts of the role are: l - Teaching your subject (60% time)  Use existing resources and design innovative Annual Plans, Unit Plans, and Lesson Plans  Teach one or two subjects of your expertise to your class (about 30 students in each class)  Conduct regular tests and assessments to monitor learning and give feedback to students  Build a positive and strong school culture with a focus on learning and joy  Collaborate with the parents of the students through regular meetings to create a positive learning environment ll - Mentoring students (20% time)  Mentor nearly 15-20 students throughout the year  Develop ways to ensure that these students have strong study habits, high attendance, and the drive to excel-share these plans with all teachers across the ecosystem  Mentor students to identify a best-fit career after Grade X lll - Leading projects in school (20% time)  Work with the School Principal and Vice Principal to lead multiple projects essential to student learning (based on your talents), such as Annual Day, Sports Day, Hobby Clubs, etc.  Use these opportunities to strengthen your leadership skills and mentor new teachers Education & Experience:  Required: Bachelors Degree with strong academic and holistic performance  Preferred: B Ed Degree  Preferred: Teaching experience in a secondary grade for 1-2 years Compensation and Benefits:  We take pride in offering competitive compensation and benefits commensurate with the candidate's education and work experience. The salary range for this position ranges from 3.3 - 4.2 LPA CTC, and we are dedicated to providing top-notch industry benefits. These benefits include PF, gratuity, medical insurance (up to 3 lakh PA), paid leaves, annual increments, and promotion opportunities.
column11: Teaching, mentoring, Classroom Management

column2: About the Organization: PRATHAM Test Prep U/o IIFM Ltd is a Premium Entrance Preparation specialist for various undergraduate courses whether it is Management, Law, Mass Communication or BCom etc. It has a curriculum which is intricately designed to meet the needs of the students who are preparing for various undergraduate entrances for various reputed colleges. The basic criteria for admission into any coveted university Pan-India is to clear an entrance exam which largely tests the Aptitude of the students in fields like Quantitative Aptitude, Verbal Ability, Logical Reasoning, General Awareness and Current Affairs. This aptitude, which is latent in every student, needs polishing and practice. The faculty members are competent, erudite and experienced. They provide relentless and unwavering guidance and students under their aegis are able to do wonders and perform to the highest of their capabilities. As selections in various coveted institutes like IIM Indore, IIM Rohtak, Shaheed Sukhdev College of Business Studies, etc. have only seen an upswing, PRATHAM as a name has become synonymous with success and progress. Tapping the potential of the students in and around Delhi has encouraged PRATHAM to expand its horizons and reach out to students beyond Delhi NCR to Chandigarh, Lucknow and Jaipur. Role & responsibilities: Conducting subject classes-  Verbal Ability  with strong emphasis on delivery of learning objectives and motivation of students to excel in the top entrance exam for various products of PRATHAM. Developing relevant study material and modification of existing study material as per Entrance Curriculum. Ensuring above average feedback from students and centers alike. Creation of completely new mock test series for relevant Entrance examinations. Recording regular Class Sessions for Online uploads. Conducting regular sessions in schools, other educational tie-ups and other forums addressing large gatherings of students and/or parents providing information like "Career options after Class 12th" while effectively pitching brand PRATHAM. Researching and developing learning objectives and study material for undergraduate entrances. Analyzing trends and patterns of previous year exam papers and ensuring all training modules such as in class assignments, practice papers and full- length mock papers are in line with the ever evolving Entrance examination patterns and structures. Regularly interacting with other internal team members and external faculty members to ensure consistency in imparting the curriculum.   Education and Knowledge: Minimum of Bachelor's degree in respective Subjects-  Eng.(H) for Verbal Ability. Professional proficiency with Microsoft office package and IT literate. People with different education backgrounds and also welcomed who have the zeal to contribute to the society by teaching and mentoring young students   Experience: 1-5 years of experience in the Coaching Test Prep industry in delivering aptitude classes (Freshers can also apply). Experience in preparing students for  Verbal Ability  subjects for the examination's like  CLAT/CAT/CUET/IPMAT  etc.   Skills: Strong hold on the subject of expertise. Very strong eye for detail. Problem-solving attitude and creativity. Verbal and written communication skills. Ability to deliver classes across PRATHAM Test Prep centers.   Personal Characteristics: Enthusiastic to learn new things and take on new challenges. Team player and possess ability to multi task Ability to meet deadlines Should take new initiatives. Professional Discipline and integrity Should be proactive Interested candidates kindly share updated resume at kajal.satija@iifm.co.in or connect at 7428983012

column1: Teaching Associate For Municipal Finance - Digital Blended Learning (D
column2: About the Digital Blended Learning programme at IIHS Digital Blended Learning is recognised as a strategically important area of growth at IIHS. The?vision for the IIHS Digital Blended Learning programme is ambitious, and involves the creation of a portfolio of Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs) and other online/blended learning offerings spanning a range of subjects relevant to the study of the Urban, for both domestic and international audiences. Job Description IIHS is looking for a teaching associate to build a portfolio of short-term and long-term courses and knowledge products in Municipal Finance in India for middle and senior governmental officials and students and sector professionals. This is a contractual engagement for an initial term of 11 months, renewable on mutual consent. Activities and Tasks Detailed responsibilities would include, but not be limited to, the following broad areas: Working closely with established experts in Municipal Finance to create online learning modules and courses on various aspects of the subject; Designing short classroom-based courses on different topics around Municipal Finance for government officials and sectoral experts; Researching the subject to create teaching material, cases, readings, worksheets, assessments and assignments on the topic; Identifying researchers, faculty and sectoral experts who can be involved as visiting faculty, guest speakers and panelists in the various programmes; Teaching in the different Municipal Finance courses designed and offered by IIHS over time; Providing support to other IIHS activities including academics, research, training, practice, operations and others; Participating in all activities of Institution-Building at IIHS; carrying out tasks as assigned by IIHS; and traveling on IIHS work within or outside the country as and when needed. Structure and Reporting The teaching associate will be an External Consultant coordinating with the Head  DBL at IIHS, or with any other person designated by the Head, and will be required to collaborate effectively with a diverse group of internal teams and external individuals/organizations, and students. Person Specification The ideal candidate should have: A Masters degree or higher in Finance / Economics / Public Administration / Public Policy; At least 3 years of experience with an academic or training institution, research organization, think-tank or consulting firm; experience as a faculty or researcher in the domain will be an added advantage. Deep research orientation, including a strong interest in going deeper into the understanding of Municipal Finance; Interest in teaching and capacity building; Excellent communication skills, spoken and written; Ability to work with and across teams in a matrix structure. This is a contractual engagement for an initial term of 11 months, renewable on mutual consent. This offer is on an exclusive basis, which implies that other professional assignments (whether compensated or not) that bear a potential conflict of interest with IIHS cannot be undertaken. The search will remain open until the position is filled. Location This position is based in New Delhi and may entail travel to other locations in India. Review and Assessment The role and performance of the incumbent shall be subject to normal review and assessment systems at IIHS. Diversity Policy IIHS is an equal opportunity employer that encourages women, people with disabilities and those from economically and socially excluded communities with the requisite skills and qualifications to apply for positions. Contact Please write to us at  hr@iihs.co.in  if you need any clarifications while filling the online application form.

column1: Climate Change Skills Education Program Manager
column2: The Climate Change Skills Education Program Manager is responsible for overseeing the implementation of a comprehensive climate change education program across 50 schools, aiming to reach and empower 4,000 girls. This role involves curriculum development, teacher training, coordination with schools, monitoring and evaluation, and ensuring the program's successful delivery.  Role & responsibilities     1. Program Planning and Development:   Develop and refine the climate change education curriculum , ensuring it is age-appropriate, engaging, and culturally relevant.   Collaborate with educational experts and climate change specialists  to integrate best practices and up-to-date information into the program.   Create detailed program plans , including timelines, budgets, and resource allocation. 2. School Coordination and Relationship Management:   Identify and establish partnerships  with 50 schools across the targeted region.   Liaise with school administrators and teachers  to schedule and coordinate program activities.   Build strong relationships with key stakeholders , including school staff, community leaders, and parents, to ensure buy-in and support for the program. 3. Training and Support:   Design and deliver training sessions  for teachers on the climate change curriculum and effective teaching strategies.   Provide ongoing support and resources  to teachers throughout the program.   Conduct site visits  to schools to observe program implementation and offer feedback. 4. Program Implementation:   Oversee the delivery of the education program , ensuring it adheres to the planned schedule and objectives.   Coordinate the distribution of educational materials  and resources to schools.   Organize and facilitate student workshops, activities, and events  related to climate change education. 5. Monitoring and Evaluation:   Develop and implement monitoring and evaluation frameworks  to assess the programs impact and effectiveness.   Collect and analyze data  on student participation, learning outcomes, and program feedback.   Prepare regular reports  on program progress, challenges, and successes for internal and external stakeholders. 6. Communication and Reporting:   Communicate regularly with the Director of Programs  and other relevant team members to provide updates on program status.   Prepare detailed reports and presentations  for donors, partners, and other stakeholders.   Document best practices and lessons learned  to inform future program iterations. Preferred candidate profile     The ideal candidate will have strong project management skills, experience in education and climate change, and a passion for gender equality.

column2: Job Title:  Assistant Professor - Physiotherapy Department Company:   Brainware University Location:  Barasat About Us:  Brainware University is a dynamic institution committed to providing high-quality education in various disciplines. We foster an environment that encourages innovation, research, and academic excellence. As we continue to grow, we are seeking passionate individuals to join our team and contribute to our vision of shaping future leaders. Job Description:  Brainware University is currently seeking a dedicated and knowledgeable Assistant Professor to join our Physiotherapy Department. The successful candidate will play a crucial role in delivering high-quality education, conducting research, and contributing to the overall academic environment of the university. Key Responsibilities: 1. Conducting lectures, seminars, and practical sessions in the field of physiotherapy. 2. Developing and updating course materials to ensure relevance and effectiveness. 3. Providing guidance and support to students in their academic and professional development. 4. Engaging in research activities, publishing papers, and participating in conferences. 5. Contributing to curriculum development and assessment processes. 6. Collaborating with colleagues and university administration on departmental initiatives. 7. Participating in academic and administrative meetings as required. Requirements: 1. A Ph.D. in the respective field of physiotherapy. 2. A Master's degree in Physiotherapy is mandatory. 3. Prior academic experience will be given preference. 4. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. 5. Demonstrated passion for teaching and research. 6. Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team. 7. Commitment to upholding academic standards and promoting a positive learning environment. Additional Information:  This is a full-time position.  Salary and benefits will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.  Brainware University is an equal opportunity employer and encourages diversity in the workplace. Why Brainware University? Join a dynamic and collaborative academic environment. Access to state-of-the-art facilities and resources. Opportunities for research, professional development, and collaboration. Competitive compensation starting with yearly incentives and other comprehensive benefits. How to Apply: If you are excited about shaping your career as an Assistant Professor, we encourage you to apply. Send your resume, cover letter, and a brief statement of your teaching philosophy to  upama.hr@brainwareuniversity.ac.in  or call at  93309-70712 . You may visit our website: www.brainwareuniversity.ac.in. Join Brainware University and make a difference in the field of education. Your expertise can inspire the future!

column2: Role & responsibilities    Job Summary: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Master Trainer specializing in Finance and Accounting to join our team. The Master Trainer will be responsible for designing, implementing, and overseeing comprehensive training programs focused on financial accounting practices, SAP, Tally, GST, tax compliance, and related areas. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in finance, accounting, and training delivery, coupled with exceptional communication skills. Responsibilities: Develop and deliver      training programs on financial accounting principles, including SAP and      Tally software utilization, GST regulations, tax compliance, and other      relevant topics. Create engaging and      effective training materials, such as presentations, manuals, simulations,      and e-learning modules, tailored to various skill levels and learning      styles. Conduct training      sessions in a variety of formats, including in-person workshops, virtual      classrooms, and self-paced online courses. Assess training needs      through consultation with finance and accounting professionals, department      heads, and management. Monitor and evaluate      the effectiveness of training programs, gathering feedback from      participants and stakeholders to make continuous improvements. Stay up-to-date with      changes in financial regulations, accounting standards, and tax laws to      ensure training content remains current and relevant. Provide one-on-one      coaching and support to employees who require additional assistance with      financial concepts or software applications. Collaborate with      cross-functional teams to integrate finance and accounting training      initiatives with other organizational development efforts. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in      Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field. Advanced      degree or professional certification  preferred. Minimum of 3 years of      experience in financial accounting, taxation, or related areas. Proficiency in SAP and      Tally software applications, with the ability to navigate and demonstrate      key functionalities to learners. Thorough understanding      of GST regulations, tax compliance requirements, and financial reporting      standards. Excellent communication      skills, including the ability to convey complex financial concepts in a      clear and understandable manner. Strong facilitation and      presentation skills, with the ability to engage and motivate learners in      various learning environments. Experience with      learning management systems (LMS) and other training technology platforms. Demonstrated leadership      abilities and a passion for mentoring and developing others in the finance      and accounting field. Benefits: Competitive salary Comprehensive benefits      package Opportunities for      professional growth and advancement Collaborative and      inclusive work environment How to Apply: Please submit your resume and cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and qualifications for this position. Include any examples of financial accounting training programs you have developed or delivered. Send your resume at sarbani.sen@icagroup.in

column2: Position Name:  Career Counsellor Role Type:  Contractual 2 months & extendable Location :  Remote  Reporting to : Ananya Bhardwaj About us Josh is on a mission to unlock human potential by creating tools that effectively nurture each individuals potential. We started out in 2015, giving Bharat?? youth access to relatable role models in regional languages through the Josh Talks platform. As the next step, we expanded to provide affordable, employability-enhancing skills through our Android application, Josh Skills. Our flagship offering, the Spoken English course, has generated strong user feedback with industry-leading course completion rates, unlocking employment opportunities for our users. As of March 24, our content has accumulated over 3 billion lifetime views, averaging 100 million+ monthly views across platforms. Josh Skills has more than 9 million downloads with 520,000 paid users. To find out more information about our work, visit joshtalks.com Awards & Recognition Forbes India 2020: Most Powerful Self-Made Women National Media Award 2019: President of India Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia: Media & Marketing In the Media Fortune India: https://www.fortuneindia.com/macro/india-inc-reacts-to-budget-2020/104067 Economic Times: https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/small-biz/startups/newsbuzz/new-energy-1-5-million-pre-series-a-round-to-help-josh-talks-go-international/articleshow/74334163.cms The Hindu: https://www.thehindu.com/society/skilled-for-life-with-josh-talks-and-nsdc/article30024016.ece EconomicTimes:   https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/why-josh-talks-has-the-energy-to-be-bigger-better-than-ted-talks/articleshow/55936596.cms About the Program: The   " Discover You "  program is a comprehensive initiative aimed at guiding high school students towards making informed career choices. This program holds interactive and motivating workshops, and personalised counselling to facilitate career development for high school students. Role Summary:  We are seeking experienced Career Counselors to join our team. In this role, you will provide comprehensive guidance and support to high school students navigating the crucial decisions of their career paths following their 10th and 12th grades. The ideal candidate will excel in one-on-one counseling sessions, helping students to explore and understand their interests, strengths, and career opportunities.  Key Responsibilities: Conduct one-on-one career counseling sessions to assist students in understanding their strengths and aligning their interests with suitable career paths. Create and maintain motivating and informative content for the program?? website and interactive sessions. Work closely with schools, Josh Talks speakers, and Marwadi University alumni to coordinate and deliver program content effectively. Collect feedback from students and educators to refine counseling techniques and workshop content. Requirements: Up to 2 years of experience in educational counseling or a related field. Bachelor's degree in Psychology, Counseling, Education, or a related field; Master?? preferred. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to interact effectively with a diverse audience. Strong organizational and planning skills. Willingness to travel extensively across the designated regions. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): Track the number of students attending workshops and accessing online resources. Measure the effectiveness of counseling sessions through student feedback and follow-up outcomes. Culture The Josh core team is composed of people who are ambitious and intend to create something that is bigger than themselves. Things that will last forever and will go on to impact and change the world. We have big dreams that are backed by our relentless pursuit to achieve them. Our Philosophy All you need is Josh. Other Details We actively seek teammates from diverse backgrounds and only hire extremely driven people. The Josh core team is composed of people who are ambitious and intend to create something that is bigger than themselves. Things that will last forever and will go on to impact and change the world. We have big dreams that are backed by our relentless pursuit to achieve them. We like no-nonsense, get stuff done kind of people and keep things simple.  ============================================================= Josh Talks is proud to provide equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all team members and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. We also provide reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities in accordance with applicable laws.

column2: Role & responsibilities:-   The duties of a full-time professor include supervising, advising, research, monitoring, keeping records, presentations etc. Mentioned below are some duties and responsibilities of a professor inside and outside the classroom: Develop and deliver graduate      courses in computer science and engineering, including but not limited to      algorithms, data structures, software engineering, computer architecture,      artificial intelligence, machine learning, and cybersecurity. Mentor and advise students on academic      matters, research projects, internships, and career development      opportunities. Conduct research in your area of      specialization, publish scholarly articles in peer-reviewed journals, and      present research findings at conferences and seminars. Provide leadership and guidance to junior      faculty, graduate students, and research assistants in the department. Contribute to the academic      governance of the university through participation in faculty senate,      academic councils, and other institutional committees. Stay abreast of emerging trends, technologies,      and best practices in computer science and engineering education and      research. Program Building: Play an integral role in the      establishment and growth of our new Computer Science and AI Department.      This will involve a range of activities from faculty recruitment to      partnerships with industry and academia. Academic Entrepreneurship: Leverage your      entrepreneurial skills to drive innovation within the program, exploring      new models of teaching, research, and industry collaboration. Strategy: Participate actively in Planning      & Implementing the growth strategy for the program in alignment with      the overall vision & philosophy of the University. Community Building: Foster a vibrant,      inclusive, and collaborative community within the program. Organize and      participate in events such as hackathons, meetups, guest lectures, etc. Prepare      lectures, syllabus, and labs for their classes Grade      the class assignments. Prepare,      execute, and grade the exams. Calculate      the grades of the students Advise      the students outside the class Research      new learning techniques and introduce them to students Supervise      and evaluate teaching by graduates and colleagues Lead      educational trips and attend various seminars Student      counselling Supervise      and help graduates in their research work Evaluate      PhD written and oral exams Write      proposals for funding agencies Draft      papers for academic journal publication Presentations      in various institutes about higher education Research      new developments in education Give      public lectures Ensure      internships and placements for all students, build industry partnerships      and conduct experiential activities for students. A      practical approach in teaching should be adhered to which involves 70%      teaching and 30% service/administrative/research/scholarship tasks to      promote hands-on learning, real-world application, and problem solving The      working hours of the teachers in full employment should not be less than      40 hours a week for 30 working weeks (180 teaching days) in an academic      year. Necessary      for the teachers to be available for at least 7 hours daily in the      University: At      least 2 hours for mentoring of students (minimum 15 students per      coordinator) for Community Development/ Extra-Curricular Activities/      Library Consultation in case of undergraduate courses. At      least 2 hours for research in case of postgraduate courses, for which      necessary space and infrastructure should be provided by the      University/College. The      minimum direct teaching-learning process hours should be 14 hours A      relaxation of 2 hours in the workload may be given to Professors,      Associate Professors who are actively involved in extension activities,      administration. They      are eligible for paid vacation, holidays, and sick time in accordance with      University policy He/she      should teach 3-4 subjects based on educational qualification and work      experience.  Teach      minimum of 14 hours per week, including introductory courses, core courses      and specialization courses in the school. All courses must be taught in      accordance with established University -approved curriculum, policies and      College requirements, and in compliance with regulatory and accreditation      agency requirements and standards. Implement      instructional strategies appropriate for the learner and content,      differentiating instruction to meet diverse learner needs; promote student      success by using creative and diverse teaching methods and      strategies.  Communicate      with students regularly, using a variety of mechanisms both written and      verbal; ensure availability to students based on the learning environment      and according to University policy and instructional standards; guide and      direct students to resources that support student success, such as the      learning management system, academic and professional resources, and      University resources. Preferred candidate profile:-   B Tech      (CSE/CS)/Mtech (CSE/CS) and Ph.D. (CSE/CS) is minimum requirement with      masters degree in relevant subject with at least 55% marks from an Indian      University, or an equivalent degree from an accredited foreign university. Preference      will be given to candidates having specialisation in Data Science ,AI and      Machine learning. Professor-Minimum      of 10 years of experience in teaching / research / industry out of which      at least 2 years shall be at a post equivalent to that of an Associate      Professor (post PhD)   Record      of Significant management and leadership experience, successful working      relationships with internal and external constituencies, including      faculty, students, alumni, and the larger professional information      management community. In the      case of research experience, good academic record and books/ research      paper publications/ IPR/ patent record are desired.  Perks and benefits:-   Attractive Salary Package. Multiple Leaves. Medical Benefits   Application- Please apply with your resume along with scanned copy of all the educational qualification experience certificates on https://sgrru.ac.in/career or send the detailed resume at dean.research@sgru.ac.in and hrhead@sgrru.ac.in Last Date of Application 10-June-24
